title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Buy Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), Patrick Rudolf Dannacher bought shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,185, increasing holdings from 151,988,020 to 164,238,020. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Rudi Reksa Sutantra Sell Shares of PT Atlantis Subsea Indonesia Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), Rudi Reksa Sutantra sold shares of PT Atlantis Subsea Indonesia Tbk (ATLA.JK) at approximately IDR 77, decreasing holdings from 3,097,511,400 to 3,077,511,400. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Indonesia Delays Mandatory B50 Biodiesel Program To Second Half Of 2026 To Reduce Diesel Imports And Boost Energy Sovereignty
body: Indonesia’s Government Has Postponed The Launch Of Its Mandatory B50 Biodiesel Program From Early 2026 To The Second Semester, After Successful B40 Trials That Cut Diesel Imports By About 10% And Saved Roughly $9.3 Billion. The Shift Aims To Eliminate Diesel Import Dependence, Support Palm Oil Smallholders, And Advance The Country’s Clean‑Energy Transition.

title: More Than 120 Companies Submit Bids For Indonesia’S Largest Waste‑To‑Energy Project
body: Indonesia’s Sovereign Wealth Fund, Danantara, Announced That Over 120 National And International Firms Have Submitted Bids For A Waste‑To‑Energy Plant Tender, With The Government Offering A Waived Tipping Fee And A Fixed Electricity Price Of Rp20 Per Kwh. The First Phase Will Build 10 Plants In Major Cities, Aiming For 33 Facilities Nationwide And A Total Investment Of $150‑$200 Million, Partly Funded Through A Rp50 Trillion Patriot Bond.

title: Indonesia To Mandate 10% Ethanol Blend In 2026, Boosting Cassava Prices And Farmer Income
body: Coordinating Minister Food Zulkifli Hasan Announced That The 2026 Mandate To Blend 10% Ethanol Into Gasoline Will Raise Cassava Prices To Rp2,000/Kg From Rp1,350/Kg, Benefiting Farmers And Supporting Domestic Ethanol Production. Energy Minister Bahlil Lahadalia Confirmed President Prabowo Subianto’s Approval Of The Policy, Which Aims To Reduce Fuel Imports And Lower Carbon Emissions While Ensuring Domestic Supply Meets Demand.

title: Indonesia Launches Minerbaone App To Boost Mining Transparency And Enforce New Rkab Validity Rules
body: Energy And Mineral Resources Minister Bahlil Lahadalia Unveiled The Minerbaone Application In Jakarta, Enabling Mining Companies To Submit Work Plans And Budgets Online And Marking A Key Milestone In The Government’s Digital Transformation. The App Also Implements A New Regulation That Shortens The Rkab Validity Period From Three Years To One Year, Affecting Companies With Rkabs Valid Beyond 2025 Under Esdm Ministerial Regulation No. 17/2025.

title: Indonesia To Build Six Integrated Aircraft Maintenance Centers Across Strategic Regions
body: Indonesia Announced Plans To Build Six Integrated Aircraft Maintenance Centers In Strategic Locations—Batam, Kertajati, Budiarto Curug, Makassar, Timika Sentani, And One Unspecified—Aiming To Create A Regional Mro Ecosystem Comparable To Malaysia’s Subang Airport. The Project, Backed By Lion Group’s Batam Aero Technic And Financed Through A Public‑Private Partnership, Will Attract Global Manufacturers Such As Boeing Gmf And Airbus, While The Timika Sentani Hub Will Focus On Servicing Small Aircraft Like Cessna Caravan And Pilatus.

title: Garuda Indonesia Reappoints New Leadership Team Amid Restructuring Efforts
body: Shareholders Approved A New Board, Appointing Glenny H. Kairupan As Ceo And Thomas Sugiarto Oentoro As Deputy Ceo, With Balagopal Kunduvara As Cfo And Risk Manager, Neil Raymond Mills As Transformation Director, And Frans Dicky Tamara As Commissioner. The Changes Support Garuda Indonesia’s Restructuring Strategy, Aligning With Government Goals To Strengthen Domestic And International Connectivity And Support Tourism Growth.

title: Madhani Talatah Nusantara Raises Rp61.2 Billion By Selling 816 Million Darma Henwa Shares At 78.81% Discount To Market Close
body: On October 10, 2025, Madhani Talatah Nusantara Sold 816 Million Darma Henwa Shares At Rp75 Per Share, Generating Rp61.2 Billion And Leaving The Company With 2.46 Billion Shares (6.07% Of The Total). The Sale Price Was 279 Points, Or 78.81%, Below Darma Henwa’s Closing Price Of Rp354 Per Share On The Same Day.

title: Jsi Sinergi Mas Increases Stake In Leyand Internasional To 12.95%, Boosting Public Ownership
body: Jsi Sinergi Mas Has Raised Its Holding In Leyand Internasional To 12.95%, Bringing Public Ownership Of The Company’s Shares To 2.41 Billion, A 16.4% Increase From The Previous Month. The Move Is Part Of Jsi’s Plan To Acquire Up To 51% Of Leyand Internasional’s Capital, With Founder Jamal Abdul Nasir Emphasizing The Strategic And Transformative Nature Of The Acquisition.

title: PT Telemedia Komunikasi Pratama Wins Region 1 1.4 Ghz Spectrum Auction For Rp403.76 Billion
body: PT Telemedia Komunikasi Pratama, A Subsidiary Of PT Solusi Sinergi Digital Tbk, Has Been Awarded The Region 1 1.4 Ghz Spectrum For Rp403.76 Billion, Covering Java, Papua, And Maluku. The Company Plans To Leverage Surge’s Existing Fiber Backbone To Rapidly Roll Out High‑Speed Fixed‑Wireless Broadband Across The Region, Aiming To Lower Per‑Customer Costs And Expand Affordable Connectivity.

title: Phintraco Sekuritas Recommends Buying PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk Shares At Rp1,960 Target Price
body: Phintraco Sekuritas Issued A Buy Recommendation For PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk On 6 October 2025, Setting A Target Price Of Rp1,960 Per Share Based On Dividend Discount, Profitability, And Market‑Cap Valuation Models. The Research Highlights Tugu’s Strong Fundamentals, Potential 9‑11% Cagr In Eps, 8‑10% Dividend Yield, And A 94.1% Upside From The Last Closing Price Of Rp1,010.

title: PT Cakra Buana Resources Energi Tbk Shares Surge 24.88% Amid Investor Optimism Over Hai Long 106 Acquisition And Upcoming Extraordinary General Meeting
body: Shares Closed At Rp1.330, Up 24.88% From Rp1.065, Reversing A Prior Decline From Rp1.800 In Early October. The Rally Reflects Investor Optimism Ahead Of Hilong Holding Limited’s Extraordinary General Meeting On 16 October In Hong Kong, Where The Acquisition Of The Hai Long 106 Offshore Vessel—Valued At About Usd 100 Million—Is To Be Discussed, And Cbre’s Broader Strategy To Strengthen Its Offshore Engineering And Logistics Portfolio.

title: PT Petrosea Tbk Boosts Talent Development And Global Expansion, Driving A 37% Workforce Increase And A $26.2 Million Pakistan Contract, As Its Shares Climb 2.24% To Rp6,850
body: PT Petrosea Tbk Is Strengthening Human Capital Through A Graduate Development Program And Expanding Its Operations Abroad, Signing A Us$26.2 Million Engineering, Procurement, And Construction Contract With Reko Diq Mining Company In Pakistan That Will Deploy 450 Employees. The Company’s Workforce Grew To 9,369 Employees—A 37% Jump From 2024—While Ptro Shares Rose 2.24% To Rp6,850, Marking A 66.7% Monthly Gain And A 183% Six‑Month Increase, And Nfcx Shares Climbed 144.3% Year‑To‑Date.

title: Bank Aladin Syariah Posts Q3 2025 Profit Of Rp128.15 Bn, Assets Climb To Rp12.79 Tn
body: In Q3 2025, Bank Aladin Syariah Recorded A Net Profit Of Rp128.15 Billion, A 262.21% Increase From A Loss Of Rp79 Billion A Year Earlier, Raising Basic Eps To Rp9 From -Rp6. The Bank's Total Assets Grew To Rp12.79 Trillion, Equity To Rp3.27 Trillion, While Liabilities Fell To Rp760.56 Billion, Driven By Higher Fund‑Management Revenue Of Rp595.57 Billion.

title: Erwin Ciputra Buy Shares of Petrosea Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), Erwin Ciputra bought shares of Petrosea Tbk (PTRO.JK) at approximately IDR 6,875, increasing holdings from 10,054,000 to 10,654,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Indonesia'S Esdm Opens Minerba Convex 2025, Emphasizing Energy Sovereignty And Nickel Hilirisasi
body: During The Opening Of Minerba Convex 2025, Minister Bahlil Lahadalia Highlighted Indonesia’s Push For Energy Sovereignty And The Expansion Of Domestic Nickel Processing, Noting That Nickel Reserves Reach 5.9 Billion Tonnes And That Export Bans On Raw Materials Have Lifted Nickel Product Exports From Us$3.3 Billion In 2017 To Us$33.9 Billion In 2024. The Event Also Announced A Shift To Annual Production Planning Cycles Under Esdm Regulation No. 17/2025 To Improve Market Responsiveness And The Construction Of Six New Integrated Nickel Smelters.

title: Krom Bank Indonesia Tbk Renews Partnership With Mambu To Support 20 Million Account Goal By 2030
body: Krom Bank Indonesia Tbk, A Digital Bank Subsidiary Of Kredivo Group, Has Renewed Its Five‑Year Partnership With The Saas Cloud Banking Platform Mambu After Launching Its Digital Banking App In 2024. The Renewal Aims To Accelerate Product Launches, Maintain Compliance, And Help Krom Reach Over 20 Million Accounts By 2030, Targeting 75% Of Indonesia’s Unbanked Or Underbanked Population.

title: Indonesia Accelerates Food Self‑Sufficiency Program, Boosting Farmer Welfare And Market Surplus
body: President Prabowo Subianto’s Presidential Decree No. 19/2025 Establishes A Coordination Team That Has Already Produced A 4‑Million‑Ton Rice Surplus And Lifted The Farmer’s Terms‑Trade Index To 124, While The Government’s Red‑And‑White Village Cooperatives Cut Middle‑Man Dependence And Raised Unhusked Rice Prices From 5,000 To 6,500 Rupiah Per Kilogram. The Initiative Also Supports A Free Nutritious Meals Program For 82.9 Million Beneficiaries, Aiming To Secure National Food Supplies And Stimulate Local Demand.

title: Indonesia Launches National Internship Program To Boost Workforce Competence
body: The Indonesian Government Has Opened The First Batch Of Its 2025 National Internship Program, Attracting 156,159 Applicants And 1,668 Participating Companies Across Key Sectors Such As Food & Beverage, Digital Creative, Manufacturing, And Logistics. Participants Will Receive A Monthly Allowance Equal To The Regional Minimum Wage, Disbursed Through State‑Owned Banks Bni, Bri, Btn, Mandiri, And Bsi, And Will Be Covered By The National Social Security Program.

title: Riau Government Promotes Halal Certification To Boost Msme Export Competitiveness
body: The Riau Provincial Government, With Support From Umkm Halal Hub, Is Preparing Msmes For Export Through Product Curation, Branding, And Market Penetration, While Indonesia’s Religious Affairs Ministry Emphasizes Halal Certification As A Strategic Quality Assurance That Enhances Consumer Trust And Market Access. The Ministry Highlights That Halal Certification Covers All Production Stages, Adds Economic Value, And Is Mandated By Laws Such As Law No. 33/2014 And Regulation No. 42/2024, Which Require Clear Labeling Of Non‑Halal Ingredients.

title: Indonesia Targets Completion Of 33 Waste‑To‑Energy Plants By 2027, Backed By Rp3 Trillion Investment
body: Co‑Ordinating Minister Food Zulkifli Hasan Announced That Indonesia Aims To Complete 33 Waste‑To‑Energy Plants By The End Of 2027, Each Capable Of Processing About 2,000 Tons Of Waste Per Day, Following Presidential Regulation 109/2025. The Project, Backed By A Rp3 Trillion Investment Per Site From Danantara Indonesia And National Investment Management Authority Danantara Indonesia, Has Attracted More Than 120 National And Multinational Companies, Amid A 2024 Waste Generation Of 34.7 Million Tons With 23.4 Million Tons Unmanaged.

title: Indonesia To Repurpose Idle Government Assets To Boost Msme Growth
body: Indonesia’s Coordinating Minister For Community Empowerment, Abdul Muhaimin Iskandar, Announced That Unused Government Facilities Will Be Converted Into Affordable Business Spaces To Support Micro, Small, And Medium Enterprises, As Part Of President Prabowo Subianto’s Directive To Eliminate Idle Public Property. The Initiative Aims To Lower Location Costs And Increase Msme Participation In The National Economy.

title: Indonesia Eases Trade Rules To Boost Msme Exports Amid Global Uncertainty
body: Indonesia's Trade Policy Reforms, Highlighted By Deputy Trade Minister Dyah Roro Esti At The 40Th Trade Expo, Aim To Help Msmes Manage Global Risks And Expand Exports By Simplifying Import Procedures Through Regulation No. 16/2025 And Launching Programs Like Umkm Bisa Ekspor. The Reforms Target A Business‑Friendly Climate, Improved Investment Flows, And Integration Into Global Value Chains, With Msmes Already Contributing 60.51% Of Indonesia's Gdp And 15.7% Of Total Exports.

title: President Prabowo Subianto Announces Plan To Streamline Indonesia’S State-Owned Enterprises To Boost Profitability
body: During The Forbes Global Ceo Conference In Jakarta, President Prabowo Subianto Said He Will Reduce Indonesia’s State‑Owned Enterprises From About 1,000 To Roughly 200–240 And Has Instructed Danantara Indonesia To Restructure Them, While New Regulations Will Allow Expatriates To Head Soes. The Move Aims To Improve Asset Returns, Which Currently Sit At Only 1–2 Percent, And To Make The Enterprises More Efficient, Transparent And Globally Competitive.

title: Mys Group Integrates Ai Design And Robotics To Launch Smart Packaging Solutions
body: Mys Group Co., Ltd. Announced The Deployment Of Artificial Intelligence In Its Packaging Design Workflow And The Use Of Robotic Arms On Its Production Lines To Enhance Efficiency And Precision. The Company Claims The Technology Shift Will Strengthen Its Competitive Edge In The Global Packaging Market.

title: Indonesia And Egypt Push For Trade Pact To Spur Growth
body: Indonesia’s Trade Minister Budi Santoso And Egypt’s General Authority Investment Free Zones Ceo Hossam Heiba Announced Plans To Negotiate A Preferential Trade Agreement At The Indonesia 2025 Trade Expo In Tangerang, With A Joint Committee Meeting Scheduled Later This Year To Accelerate The Deal. Total Trade Between The Two Countries Reached Us$1.74 Billion In 2024, With Indonesia’s Exports Of Palm Oil, Coffee And Partially Processed Iron Steel Accounting For Us$1.53 Billion, And Both Sides Highlighted Mutual Recognition Of Halal Certification To Ease Market Access.

title: Erwin Ciputra Increases Ptro Holdings Amid Strong Share Gains And New Mining Contract
body: Erwin Ciputra, A Commissioner Of PT Petrosea Tbk, Added 600,000 Shares Of Ptro At Rp 6,875 Per Share (Rp 4.12 Billion) On 15 October 2025, Raising His Stake From 0.0997% To 0.1056%, While Ptro’s Shares Climbed 4.48% To Rp 7,000, Marking A 153.39% Ytd Gain. The Company Also Signed A Limited Notice Proceed With Reko Diq Mining Company Limited For A $26.2 Million Engineering, Procurement & Construction Contract, And Bni Sekuritas’ Fanny Suherman Recommends A Speculative Buy With A Target Of Rp 6,900‑7,200 And A Cut‑Loss At Rp 6,400.

title: Indonesia Retail Treasury Bond Ori028 Sees Strong Demand, 3‑Year Tenor Dominates Sales
body: The Ori028 Retail Treasury Bond Offering, Launched On 29 September And Running Until 23 October 2025, Has Attracted Rp 8.09 Trillion In Sales On Thursday, With The 3‑Year Tenor Capturing 63.84 % Of The Rp 10 Trillion National Quota (Rp 6.38 Trillion) And The 6‑Year Tenor Selling 34.13 % Of The Rp 5 Trillion Quota (Rp 1.70 Trillion). Major Banks Such As Bca, Bni, And Mandiri Sekuritas Report High Uptake, Especially For The 3‑Year Bond, And Analysts Predict Overall Absorption Could Reach 80‑90 % Of The Rp 15 Trillion Target.

title: Danantara To Channel Rp16 Trillion Of Bumn Dividend Funds Into Indonesia'S Capital Market To Strengthen Liquidity
body: Danantara, The Investment Manager For The Indonesian Government, Plans To Deploy About Rp16 Trillion (Us$10 Billion) Of Bumn Dividend Proceeds Into The Indonesian Equity And Bond Markets Within Two Months, Aiming To Act As A Liquidity Provider And Lift Daily Trading Volumes To Us$5–8 Billion. Analysts Say The Injection Could Stabilize The Market And Support Key Sectors Such As Construction, Energy, And Infrastructure, Though It May Not Directly Drive Index Gains.

title: Sudhamek Agoeng Adds 229.39 Million Shares Of Garudafood, Boosting Holdings To 3.19 Billion Shares (8.66%)
body: Sudhamek Agoeng Purchased 229.39 Million Shares Of Garudafood On October 15, 2025, With The Transaction Facilitated By Indo Premier Sekuritas, Increasing Its Stake To 3.19 Billion Shares (8.66%) From 2.96 Billion Shares (8.04%). At The Closing Price Of Rp380 Per Share, The Purchase Was Valued At Approximately Rp87.16 Billion.

title: Bukalapak.Com Holds 41.81% Of Ipo Proceeds, Aims To Realize Remaining Funds By End Of 2025
body: Bukalapak.Com Has Retained Rp8.58 Trillion (41.81% Of The Rp21.9 Trillion Ipo Collection) And Has Absorbed Rp12.74 Trillion (58.19%) Of The Proceeds By June 30, 2025, With Management Stating That The Remaining Funds Will Be Realized Within The Next Two Months To Meet The December 31, 2025 Target. The Company Is Keeping Unutilized Ipo Proceeds In Low‑Risk Financial Instruments While Monitoring Market Conditions And Will Report Any Schedule Changes Per Regulatory Requirements.

title: Hillcon Equity Management Sells 35 Million Hillcon Shares At Rp240, Raising Rp8.4 Billion And Slightly Diluting Its Stake
body: On 13 October 2025, Hillcon Equity Management Disposed Of 35 Million Hillcon Shares At An Execution Price Of Rp240 Per Share, 22.44% Above The Closing Price Of Rp196, Generating Rp8.4 Billion. The Transaction Reduced Hillcon Equity's Ownership To 7.28 Billion Shares (49.43%), A Dilution Of About 0.24% From The Pre‑Transaction Level.

title: Bali Towerindo Reports 32.16% Rise In Net Profit To Rp138.72 Billion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025
body: For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Bali Towerindo Posted Net Profit Of Rp138.72 Billion, Up 32.16% Year‑On‑Year, With Earnings Per Share Increasing To Rp35.26. Revenue Grew 22.15% To Rp922.01 Billion And Total Assets Rose To Rp6.33 Trillion.

title: Capital Strategic Invesco Sells 2.66 Billion Shares Of Capital Financial Indonesia, Cutting Its Stake To 55.55%
body: On October 15, 2025, Capital Strategic Invesco Divested 2,669,337,000 Shares Of Capital Financial Indonesia With The Help Of Pacific Sekuritas Indonesia, Sinarmas Sekuritas, And Ocbc Sekuritas Indonesia. The Sale Reduced Its Holding To 30.26 Billion Shares (55.55% Of Total), A 4.9% Dilution From 60.45%, And Was Valued At Roughly Rp2.85 Trillion Based On A Closing Price Of Rp1,070 Per Share.

title: Gts Internasional Plans Up To $508 Million Investment To Expand Lng Fleet And Build Regasification Plant By 2026
body: Gts Internasional, The Lng Transport Arm Of Tommy Soeharto’s Conglomerate, Announced A Us$508 Million (≈Rp7.5 Trillion) Investment Plan Through 2026 To Accelerate Fleet Expansion And Fund A Us$175 Million Regasification Project Slated For June 2026. The Plan Includes Acquiring A Former Gaslog Partners Vessel Valued At About Rp1.2 Trillion, Adding One New Ship By Year‑End, Another In 2025 And Two More In 2026, Backed By Double‑Digit Profit Growth And A Notable Rise In Its Share Price Since Early 2025.

title: Bni Provides Financing For PT Geo Dipa Energi’S 500 Mw Geothermal Power Expansion
body: Bni Announced A Credit And Trade Facility To Fund The Development And Operation Of PT Geo Dipa Energi’s 500 Mw Geothermal Project, Formalized At The Indonesia International Sustainability Forum 2025. The Financing Supports The Expansion Of Geo Dipa’s Pltp Dieng And Pltp Patuha From 120 Mw To 500 Mw, Reinforcing Bni’s Role In Green Financing.

title: PT Graha Mitra Asia Tbk. Approves Idr 0.22 Per Share Interim Cash Dividend For Fy2025
body: PT Graha Mitra Asia Tbk. Approved An Interim Cash Dividend Of Idr 0.22 Per Share (Total Idr 1.26 Billion) For Fy2025, Based On June‑30 2025 Results Showing Net Profit Of Idr 3.53 Billion, Retained Earnings Of Idr 23.12 Billion And Equity Of Idr 240.93 Billion, With A Dividend Yield Of About 0.54%. The Dividend Is Scheduled For Distribution Between 24‑29 October 2025, And The Stock (Relf) Closed At Idr 41, Down 8.89%.

title: Erwin Ciputra Raises His Holding In PT Petrosea Tbk With 600,000‑Share Purchase
body: On 15 October 2025, Commissioner Erwin Ciputra Bought 600,000 Ptro Shares At An Average Price Of Rp6,875, Increasing His Total Stake To 10.65 Million Shares (0.1056% Of PT Petrosea Tbk). After The Transaction, Ptro Closed Up 4.48% At Rp7,000, Having Risen 66.7% Over The Past Month And 183% Over The Past Six Months.

title: Commissioner Noel Aelyo Laras Kusuma Negara Sells 50,000 Shares Of PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk., Retaining A 1.486% Stake
body: On 13 October 2025, Noel Aelyo Laras Kusuma Negara Divested 50,000 Shares Of PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk. At Rp995 Each, Leaving Him With 69.95 Million Shares (1.486% Of Paid‑Up Capital). The Stock Edged Up 10 Points To Rp980 (+1.03%) But Has Slipped 1.51% Week‑Over‑Week, 1.01% Month‑Over‑Month, And 13.66% Year‑To‑Date From Rp1,135 On 16 October 2025.

title: PT Hartadinata Abadi Tbk Says It Has No Material Information Behind Recent Sharp Stock Price Surge
body: The Company Responded To A Request From PT Bursa Efek Indonesia, Stating It Is Unaware Of Any Material Facts Or Shareholder Actions That Could Explain The Recent Rally, And It Has No Imminent Corporate Actions. Despite The Clarification, The Stock Has Jumped 12.9% To Rp1,615, Up 54.5% Week‑Over‑Week, 81.4% Month‑To‑Date, 169.1% Over Six Months, And 392.3% Year‑To‑Date.

title: PT Sreeya Sewu Indonesia Tbk Appoints Eddy Tamboto As President Director, Replacing Sungkono Sadikin
body: The Extraordinary General Meeting In Jakarta Approved Eddy Tamboto As The New President Director Of PT Sreeya Sewu Indonesia Tbk, Along With Changes To The Board Of Commissioners And Directors, With The New Management Serving Until The 2027 Annual Shareholders Meeting. Outgoing Director Sungkono Sadikin Highlighted A Positive Industry Trend And Noted An 11% Increase In Feed Production Volume In Q3‑2025 Compared With The Same Period Last Year.

title: PT Atlantis Subsea Indonesia Tbk. Owner Rudi Reksa Sutantra Reduces Stake After Selling 25 Million Shares In October 2025
body: Rudi Reksa Sutantra Sold A Total Of 25 Million Atla Shares On 10, 13 And 14 October 2025 At Prices Between Rp77 And Rp80, Lowering His Holding To 3.07 Billion Shares (49.64% Of The Float) From 3.09 Billion. Following The Sales, Atla’s Share Price Rose 2.82% To Rp73, Up 5.4% Month‑To‑Date And 46% Over Both The Past Six Months And The Year.

title: PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya Neutral Shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya neutral shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at approximately IDR 1,320, decreasing holdings from 108,340,500 to 108,338,600. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Andri Hutama Putra Sell Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), Andri Hutama Putra sold shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,200, decreasing holdings from 21,846,800 to 21,266,800. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Cakra Bhakti Para Putra Buy Shares of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), PT Cakra Bhakti Para Putra bought shares of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk (ISSP.JK) at approximately IDR 402, increasing holdings from 4,117,661,730 to 4,118,806,030. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Buy Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), Patrick Rudolf Dannacher bought shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 959, increasing holdings from 164,238,020 to 165,949,520. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT 1 Inti Dot Com Buy Shares of PT Distribusi Voucher Nusantara Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), PT 1 Inti Dot Com bought shares of PT Distribusi Voucher Nusantara Tbk (DIVA.JK) at approximately IDR 218, increasing holdings from 300,000,000 to 310,199,600. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Noel Aelyo Laras Kusuma Negara Sell Shares of PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), Noel Aelyo Laras Kusuma Negara sold shares of PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk (DRMA.JK) at approximately IDR 995, decreasing holdings from 70,000,000 to 69,950,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT 1 Inti Dot Com Buy Shares of PT Distribusi Voucher Nusantara Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 16, 2025 (WIB), PT 1 Inti Dot Com bought shares of PT Distribusi Voucher Nusantara Tbk (DIVA.JK) at approximately IDR 218, decreasing holdings from 300,000,000 to 10,199,600. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: 54 Foreign Firms Express Interest In Indonesia’S National Waste‑To‑Energy Program
body: Indonesia’s Investment Agency Danantara Indonesia Reports That 54 Foreign Companies, Mainly From Japan, China, Germany, The Netherlands, And Singapore, Have Shown Interest In The National Waste‑To‑Energy Program, Joining 53 Domestic Firms For A Total Of 107 Applicants. The Program Plans 33 Projects Across 10 Cities, Each Costing $150‑$200 Million, With An Auction Expected To Conclude In 6‑8 Weeks Under President Prabowo Subianto’s Green‑Technology Regulation.

title: Indonesia Secures Food Export Deals With Singapore, Malaysia, Australia, Netherlands, And Italy At Pangan Nusa Expo 2025
body: At Pangan Nusa Expo 2025 In Tangerang, Indonesia’s Ministry Of Trade Signed Memorandums Of Understanding With Singapore, Malaysia, Australia, The Netherlands, And Italy, Opening New Markets For Indonesian Food Products. The Event Recorded Rp800 Million In Transactions On Its First Day And Showcased 186 Ready‑To‑Eat Packaged Foods, While Also Featuring Domestic Matchmaking With Companies Such As PT Kai, Kai Services, Sarinah, Smesco, And Hippindo Aprindo.

title: Indonesia'S Energy Minister Reaffirms Commitment To Responsible Natural Resource Management And Equitable Downstream Development
body: Minister Bahlil Lahadalia Emphasized That Indonesia’s Mining Policies Align With President Prabowo Subianto’s Directive To Sustainably Manage Natural Resources, Highlighting The Approval Of 18–20 Downstream Projects Worth Us$38 Billion That Are Expected To Create 300,000 Direct And Over One Million Indirect Jobs. The Government Also Launched The Minerbaone App To Digitize Mining Governance And Promote Transparency, Prioritizing Msmes, Cooperatives, And Regional Government-Owned Enterprises.

title: PT Astra International Tbk Expected To Deliver Positive Surprise In Q3‑2025 Earnings
body: Analysts Now Forecast PT Astra International Tbk’s Net Profit To Fall To About Rp 7.9 Trillion, A 7 % Qoq And 21 % Yoy Decline. However, Rising Automotive Wholesales (6.9 % Qoq) And Astra Car Sales (5.4 % Qoq) Could Offset The Hit, Keeping Net Margins Near 25‑26 % And Market Share Around 52 % With A Seasonal Lift Expected In Q4 2025.

title: Victoria Insurance Plans A 146.05 Million‑Share Private Placement To Meet Ojk Equity Requirements
body: The Insurer Will Issue 146,057,361 New Shares At A Nominal Rp100 Each, Representing Up To 10 % Of Its Paid‑In Capital, With Proceeds Earmarked For Working Capital, Capital‑Structure Strengthening And Compliance With The Ojk’s Minimum Equity Mandate Of At Least Rp250 Billion By 31 December 2026. An Extraordinary Shareholders’ Meeting Is Scheduled For 20 October 2025, With A Record Date Of 25 September 2025.

title: Garuda Indonesia Appoints Glenny H. Kairupan As Ceo And Adds Two Expatriate Directors Amid Usd1.44 Bn Capital Raise
body: Glenny H. Kairupan Replaces Wamildan Tsani As Director Utama Of PT Garuda Indonesia Tbk, While Balagopal Kunduvara And Neil Raymond Mills Join As Foreign Directors For Finance‑Risk And Transformation. The Airline’s Recovery Plan, Led By Rosan Perkasa Roeslani, Includes A Usd405 M Shareholder Loan And A Usd1.44 Bn Private‑Placement Capital Increase That Will Raise About Rp23.39 Trillion And Increase Danantara’s Stake To 93.5%.

title: Ludijanto Setijo Sell Shares of Indo Acidatama Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Ludijanto Setijo sold shares of Indo Acidatama Tbk (SRSN.JK) at approximately IDR 77, decreasing holdings from 365,828,912 to 315,827,912. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Karnadi Margaka Sell Shares of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Karnadi Margaka sold shares of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk (GPSO.JK) at approximately IDR 1,130, decreasing holdings from 143,033,800 to 133,033,800. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Karnadi Margaka Sell Shares of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Karnadi Margaka sold shares of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk (GPSO.JK) at approximately IDR 75. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Amir Sunarko Transaction Shares of PT SLJ Global Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Amir Sunarko transaction shares of PT SLJ Global Tbk (SULI.JK) at approximately IDR 109, increasing holdings from 289,840,771 to 293,467,104. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Indonesia’S Trade Ministry And Migrant Workers Ministry Sign Mou To Turn Migrant Workers Into Export Promoters
body: Trade Minister Budi Santoso And Migrant Workers Protection Minister Mukhtarudin Signed A Memorandum Of Understanding In Tangerang, Banten, To Empower Indonesian Migrant Workers As Economic Promotional Agents Abroad, Focusing On Capacity Building, Market Insight Gathering, And Product Promotion. The Partnership Aims To Transform Returning Workers Into Entrepreneurs Who Can Boost National Exports And Support Micro, Small, And Medium Enterprises In Accessing Global Markets.

title: Twenty Of Twenty‑Two Cikande Factories Cleared Of Cesium‑137 Contamination, Authorities Report
body: The Cs‑137 Radionuclide Radiation Management Task Force Announced That 20 Of 22 Factories In The Cikande Modern Industrial Estate In Serang, Banten, Have Been Declared Free Of Cesium‑137 Contamination After Verification By Brin And Bapeten. The Cleanup Also Removed A Protective Line At PT Jongka Indonesia, A Scrap‑Metal Mill, And The Government Is Pursuing Criminal And Civil Action Against The Source Of Contamination Linked To PT Pmt.

title: Indonesia'S Minister Urges Msmes To Use Creative Branding To Counter Imported Goods, Highlights Rp300 Trillion Credit Program
body: Minister Maman Abdurrahman Urged Local Entrepreneurs To Adopt Creative Branding And Marketing Gimmicks To Compete With Imported Products, While Stressing The Need For Stronger Enforcement Against Counterfeit Goods. The Ministry Reported That Rp300 Trillion Has Been Allocated For The 2025 Smallholder Business Credit Program, With Rp206.2 Trillion Already Disbursed To 3.5 Million Borrowers And Production‑Sector Credit Surpassing 60% Of The Target At Rp124.7 Trillion.

title: Ceo Karnadi Margaka Sells Remaining 180 Million Gpso Shares, Ending Control Of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk.
body: On October 16, 2025, Karnadi Margaka Sold The Remaining 180 Million Shares Of Gpso At Prices Between Rp75 And Rp1,325 Per Share, Reducing His Stake To Zero And Ending His Controlling Status. The Sale Follows A Prior October 14 Transaction Where He Divested 170 Million Shares At Rp59 Each, Cutting His Ownership From 52.49 % To About 27 % Of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk.

title: PT Waskita Beton Precast Tbk Reports Solid Q3 2025 Performance With Revenue Of Rp1.17 Trillion
body: PT Waskita Beton Precast Tbk (Wsbp) Posted Q3 2025 Revenue Of Rp1.17 Trillion, Driven By Rp528.66 Billion From Precast Concrete, Rp358.99 Billion From Readymix & Quarry, And Rp280.51 Billion From Construction Services, While Gross Profit Reached Rp201.49 Billion With A 17.25% Margin. The Company Also Managed Rp2.12 Trillion In Contract Value, Secured Rp838.09 Billion In New Contracts (70.24% External), And Paid Rp112.34 Billion Of Cfads Stage Vi, Totaling Rp541.74 Billion Paid To Date.

title: PT Perintis Triniti Properti Tbk. Sees Share Price Surge Amid Market Confidence, Despite Trading Suspension
body: Following A Public Expose Incident And A Temporary Trading Suspension, PT Perintis Triniti Properti Tbk. (Trin) Saw Its Shares Jump 125% To Rp252, With A Ytd Gain Of 125% From Rp112 On Jan 2 2025. Management Said The Rally Reflects Market Confidence, While Triniti Land Posted A Rp5.3 Bn Net Profit For Semester I‑2025 And Is Advancing Strategic Projects—Collins Boulevard Di Alam Sutera, Sequoia Hills Di Sentul, Marc ’ S Boulevard Di Batam, Holdwell Business Park Di Lampung—Worth Over Rp10 Trillion And Preparing Corporate Actions To Strengthen Its Capital Structure.

title: PT 1 Inti Dot Com Raises Control Shareholding To 21.71% Via Three Purchases In Oct 2025
body: PT 1 Inti Dot Com, The Controlling Shareholder Of PT Distribusi Voucher Nusantara Tbk., Purchased 10.2 Million Shares Between 13–15 Oct 2025 At Prices From Rp196 To Rp218 Per Share, Boosting Its Ownership To 21.71%. Diva’s Shares Closed Down 2.88% At Rp202 On Friday, Yet Have Risen 9.19% Over The Week, 53.03% Over The Month, And 51.08% Year‑To‑Date.

title: Cbre Shares Jump 7.2% As Egm Hilong Holding Limited Approves Sale Of Hai Long 106 To PT Cakra Buana Resources Energi Tbk
body: Cbre Stock Rose 7.2% To Rp1.785 Per Share After Egm Hilong Holding Limited Approved The Sale Of The Offshore Vessel Hai Long 106 To PT Cakra Buana Resources Energi Tbk, Marking A Usd 100 Million Transaction That Investors View As A Potential Synergy Catalyst. The Move Follows A Dramatic Rally, With Cbre Up 115.4% In The Past Month, 6,269% Over Six Months, And 6,478% Year‑To‑Date, And The Company Plans To Seek Shareholder Approval At Its Rups On 27 October 2025.

title: Saham PT Jaya Sukses Makmur Sentosa Shares (Rise) Surge Over 350% In One Month Amid Expansion Projects
body: Rise Shares Jumped 32.57% In The Past Week And More Than 350% In The Last Month, Reaching Rp6,100 After A 9.9% Intraday Rise, Amid Rumors Of A Major Corporate Action To Fund Four Expansion Projects. Management Says The Price Surge Reflects Market Dynamics And That The Company Is Still Evaluating Funding Options, Including A Potential Right Issue, While Maintaining Transparency Under Ojk And Bei Regulations.

title: PT Asri Karya Lestari Tbk. Clarifies Q2 2025 Profit Decline, Highlights 7.6% Revenue Growth And Rp393Bn Tender Pipeline
body: Director Didik Hariyanto Explained That The Q2 2025 Profit Drop Was Mainly Due To Higher Cost Of Goods, Especially Logistics And Labor In Kalimantan, While Revenue Grew 7.6% Yoy To June 2025. The Company Is Pursuing Rp393 Billion In Construction Tenders, Focusing On Efficiency And Shifting From Apbn To Private And Bumn Projects, And Notes That Its Stock, Which Had Been Suspended, Has Surged 143.2% In The Last Month And 226% Over Six Months.

title: PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk Completes Treasury Stock Sale, Netting Rp1.036 Billion
body: PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk Sold 3,391,100 Treasury Shares At An Average Price Of Rp305.55 Per Share, Generating A Total Transaction Value Of Rp1,036,159,067. The Sale, Executed Between Oct 1 And Oct 13, 2025 By Bni Sekuritas, Reduces The Remaining Treasury Shares To 4,648,700.

title: Bank Of Singapore LIMITED Buy Shares of Pioneerindo Gourmet International Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Bank Of Singapore LIMITED bought shares of Pioneerindo Gourmet International Tbk (PTSP.JK) at approximately IDR 930, increasing holdings from 17,606,220 to 17,626,220. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Bank Of Singaporelimited Buy Shares of Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Bank Of Singaporelimited bought shares of Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia Tbk (MREI.JK) at approximately IDR 1,000, increasing holdings from 32,240,155 to 32,295,155. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Buy Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Patrick Rudolf Dannacher bought shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,175, increasing holdings from 165,949,520 to 174,580,520. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Indonesia Allows Foreign Nationals To Lead State-Owned Enterprises, With Garuda Indonesia Appointing Two Foreign Board Directors
body: President Prabowo Subianto’s New Rule Permits Expatriates To Head Indonesia’s State‑Owned Enterprises, A Policy Explained By Minister State Secretary Prasetyo Hadi As A Means To Bring Global Expertise. Garuda Indonesia Has Already Appointed Two Foreign Nationals—Balagopal Kunduvara And Neil Raymond Mills—To Its Board, While The Sovereign Wealth Fund Danantara Has Been Instructed To Recruit Top International Talent.

title: Indonesia’S Red White Co‑Ops To Supply Mbg Kitchens With Guaranteed Rice Purchases
body: Head Of The National Nutrition Agency, Dadan Hindayana, Announced That Indonesia’s 80,000 Red White Co‑Ops Will Serve As A Key Support System For Mbg Kitchens By Guaranteeing Purchases Of At Least Five Tons Of Rice Per Month Through The Sppgs. The Initiative, Launched Under Presidential Instruction No. 9 2025, Aims To Strengthen The Food Supply Chain And Empower Local Producers By Integrating Cooperatives Into The Mbg Supply Chain.

title: Danantara Indonesia Urges State-Owned Enterprises To Accelerate Ipos To Strengthen The Country’S Capital Market.
body: At The 2025 Capital Market Summit & Expo, Danantara Indonesia’s Chief Investment Officer Pandu Sjahrir Announced The Agency’s Commitment To Support Indonesia’s Stock Market By Encouraging State‑Owned Enterprises’ Subsidiaries To Become Quality Issuers And By Allocating About 80% Of Its Investment Funds Domestically This Year. With 23 Companies Already Ipoed And 11 In Preparation, The Move Aims To Boost Liquidity, Attract Global Investors, And Help Position Indonesia As A Leading Financial Hub In Southeast Asia.

title: Indonesia To Revitalize Fertilizer Factories To Boost Food Self‑Sufficiency
body: Indonesia’s Ministry Of Agriculture Announced A Plan To Revitalize State‑Owned Fertilizer Factories, With Pupuk Indonesia Preparing 1.2 Million Tons Of Subsidized Fertilizer And An Additional 480,000 Tons Of Non‑Subsidized Fertilizer For The Current Planting Season. The Initiative, Backed By President Prabowo Subianto, Aims To Improve Production Efficiency, Lower Costs, And Secure Affordable, High‑Quality Fertilizers For Farmers To Strengthen National Food Security.

title: Indonesia Launches Msme‑Focused Gastronomic Tourism Initiative To Boost Local Economies
body: Indonesia’s Msme Minister Maman Abdurrahman Announced A New Gastronomic Tourism Program At The 2025 International Conference Tourism, Gastronomy, Tourist Destinations, Targeting 6,156 Tourist Villages And Emphasizing Locally Sourced Ingredients, Hygiene, And Digital Promotion. The Government Has Earmarked Rp300 Trillion For The Sector This Year, With Rp206.2 Trillion Already Disbursed To 3.5 Million Borrowers Under The People’s Business Credit Program.

title: Karnadi Margaka Sell Shares of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Karnadi Margaka sold shares of PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk (GPSO.JK) at approximately IDR 1,325, decreasing holdings from 180,000,000 to 143,033,800. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Alamtri Resources Indonesia Tbk Buy Shares of PT Alamtri Minerals Indonesia Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 17, 2025 (WIB), Alamtri Resources Indonesia Tbk bought shares of PT Alamtri Minerals Indonesia Tbk (ADMR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,435, increasing holdings from 34,525,541,100 to 34,756,541,100. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Myrepublic Indonesia Wins 1.4 Ghz Frequency Bids For Regions Ii And Iii, Expanding Fiber And Fixed Wireless Coverage
body: Myrepublic Indonesia, A Subsidiary Of Eka Mas Republik And Part Of Dian Swastatika Sentosa, Has Secured The 1.4 Ghz Frequency Spectrum For Regional Ii (Sumatera, Bali, Nusa Tenggara) And Regional Iii (Kalimantan, Sulawesi), Enabling The Company To Extend High‑Speed Internet Via Fiber And Fixed‑Wireless Access To Underserved Areas. Ceo Timotius Max Sulaiman Said The Win Supports The Government's Goal Of Nationwide Digital Inclusion And Will Help Drive Regional Economic Growth.

title: PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia Buy Shares of PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 19, 2025 (WIB), PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia bought shares of PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk. (DADA.JK) at approximately IDR 152, increasing holdings from 4,207,637,600 to 4,275,582,200. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia Buy Shares of PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 19, 2025 (WIB), PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia bought shares of PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk. (DADA.JK) at approximately IDR 153, increasing holdings from 4,275,582,200 to 4,308,611,800. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: President Prabowo Subianto Orders Revitalization Of Fertilizer Plants And Boost Of Stem Human Resources
body: In A Limited Meeting At His Private Residence, President Prabowo Subianto Instructed Minister Of Agriculture Andi Amran Sulaiman To Revitalize Fertilizer Factories And Minister Of Higher Education, Science, Technology Brian Yuliarto To Prepare Human Resources In Stem Fields. The Aim Is To Secure Fertilizer Availability, Lower Prices For Farmers, And Achieve Food Self‑Sufficiency While Prioritizing Funding For Education Scholarships In Key Sectors Such As Food, Energy, Health, Defense, Maritime, Downstream Industrialization, Digitalization, And Advanced Materials Manufacturing.

title: Four Indonesian Listed Companies To Distribute Interim Cash Dividends In Late October To Mid-November 2025
body: Four Indonesian Listed Companies—PT Formosa Ingredient International Tbk., PT Plaza Indonesia Realty Tbk., PT Central Omega Resources Tbk., And PT Graha Mitra Asia Tbk.—Have Announced Interim Cash Dividend Payouts Scheduled Between Late October And Mid-November 2025. The Dividends Are Set At Rp2 Per Share And Rp0.22 Per Share, Reflecting A Positive Signal For Investors Amid Market Fluctuations.

title: Ludijanto Setijo Divests 63.5 Million Srsn Shares, Cutting Stake To 5.25% Amid Price Decline
body: Ludijanto Setijo, Controlling Shareholder Of PT Indo Acidatama Tbk., Divested 63.5 Million Shares Of Srsn Between Oct 9–13 2025, Selling 50,001,000 Shares At Rp77–78 Per Share (~Rp3.88 Bn) And 13.5 Million Shares At The Same Price (~Rp1.05 Bn), Reducing His Stake To 315.8 Million Shares (5.25%) From 365.8 Million (6.08%). The Srsn Share Price Fell 4.29% To Rp67, Down 10.67% In A Week From Rp75, While Its Ytd Performance Rose 34% From Rp50 In January 2025.

title: Onix Capital Reports Rp22.41 Billion Loss For September 2025
body: Onix Capital Posted A Net Loss Of Rp22.41 Billion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Up From Rp4.27 Billion A Year Earlier, Driven By A Rp16.81 Billion Foreign Exchange Loss And A Rp16.57 Billion Increase In Other Expenses. Total Assets Rose To Rp11.58 Billion From Rp3.26 Billion, While Liabilities Increased To Rp282.15 Billion, Widening The Deficit To Rp321.64 Billion.

title: Amir Sunarko Increases His Slj Global Holdings To 293.46 Million Shares In Three Transactions On October 15, 2025
body: On October 15, 2025, Amir Sunarko Bought 13,761,468 Shares At Rp109 Each, Sold 8,556,335 Shares At Rp138, And Sold Another 1,578,800 Shares At Rp148, Raising His Slj Global Stake To 293.46 Million Shares (4.64%). The Transactions Added 0.05 Percentage Points To His Holdings, Up From 289.84 Million Shares (4.59%).

title: Solusi Bangun Indonesia Ceo Ainul Yaqin Resigns Effective 17 Oct 2025
body: Ainul Yaqin Has Been Removed From The Position Of Ceo Of Solusi Bangun Indonesia (Sbi) Effective 17 Oct 2025. Asruddin Has Been Appointed As Interim Ceo Pending The Extraordinary General Meeting, Following The Board Of Commissioners' Decision On 15 Oct 2025.

title: Alamtri Resources Increases Its Stake In Alamtri Minerals By Acquiring 231 Million Shares At Rp1.435 Per Share
body: Alamtri Resources Bought 231 Million Shares Of Alamtri Minerals On 16 October 2025 At Rp1.435 Per Share, A Price 14.32% Below The Closing Price Of Rp1.675, Spending Rp331.38 Billion And Raising Its Holding To 34.75 Billion Shares (85.016%).

title: PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia Buy Shares of PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 19, 2025 (WIB), PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia bought shares of PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk. (DADA.JK) at approximately IDR 157, increasing holdings from 4,370,497,400 to 4,377,156,100. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Indonesia'S Msmes Urged To Adopt Insurance To Strengthen Resilience Amid Economic And Climate Risks
body: Indonesia’s Minister Of Micro, Small, And Medium Enterprises, Maman Abdurrahman, Urged Msmes To Increase Insurance Uptake To Better Withstand Disasters And Economic Shocks, Noting Only 2.96% Have Disaster Insurance And 53% Have Made No Preparations. The Ministry Reported That As Of October 17, Rp217.1 Trillion In Financing Had Been Disbursed To Nearly 3.7 Million Msmes, With About 60% Directed To The Production Sector.

title: Indonesia Allocates 20% Of Red White Village Cooperative Revenue To Rural Governments To Boost Local Economies
body: Indonesia’s Ministry Of Villages Development Announced That 20% Of Revenue From The Red White Village Cooperatives Program Will Be Transferred To Rural Governments, A Move Aimed At Strengthening Local Economies And Ensuring Cooperatives Become Economic Centers. The Government Also Plans To Fast‑Track The Construction Of Key Facilities For About 800 Cooperatives Nationwide Starting In October, Following The Inauguration Of 80,000 Cooperatives Under The Kdmp Program.

title: Danantara To Shift 80% Of Managed Funds To Indonesian Domestic Instruments, Including The Stock Market
body: Danantara’s Cio Pandu Sjahrir Announced Plans To Channel About 80% Of Its Managed Funds Into Domestic Instruments, With A Focus On The Indonesia Stock Exchange, After A Brief Period Of Investing Mainly In Government Bonds. The Move Comes As The Idx’s Market Cap Reaches Rp15,230 Trillion, While Daily Trading Volume Remains Below The Us $5–8 Billion Target Needed For Equity Liquidity.

title: Indonesia Launches Integrated Waterfront City Plan To Boost Blue Economy
body: Indonesia’s Ministry Of Marine Affairs And Fisheries Announced A Waterfront City Concept That Integrates Marine And Land Spatial Planning Across Seven Coastal Cities, Aiming To Increase Tourism, Commerce, And Renewable Energy Development While Reducing Land‑Use Conflicts And Supporting The National Blue‑Economy Agenda. The Plan, Part Of The National Marine Spatial Plan Slated For Enactment In December 2025, Includes Zoning For 17 Inter‑Regional, 16 National Strategic, 44 Specific National Strategic, And 34 Coastal Small‑Island Areas.

title: Prabowo Orders Faster Refinery Projects And Legalization Of Community-Run Oil Wells Across Indonesia
body: President Prabowo Has Ordered The Acceleration Of Oil Refinery Construction And The Licensing Of Community-Run Oil Wells, With Regulation No. 14/2025 Granting Legal Recognition And Pertamina Set To Purchase The Output At 80% Of The Indonesian Crude Price. Two Of The 18 Planned Refinery Sites Are In Final Construction, While The Rest Await Feasibility Studies, And Licensing For Community Wells Is Slated To Start In Late November 2025.

title: Indonesia'S Transmigration Ministry Allocates Over Rp300 Billion For 2025 Development Of Transmigration Areas
body: The Transmigration Ministry Announced A Budget Allocation Of More Than Rp300 Billion For 2025 To Support Infrastructure, Land Resolution, And Economic Development In Transmigration Areas Across Indonesia. The Ministry Highlighted Five Key Programs—Transmigration Tuntas, Transmigration Lokal, Transmigration Patriot, Transmigration Karya Nusantara, And Transmigration Gotong Royong—To Build A Comprehensive Living Ecosystem And Shift Responsibility To Local Governments After Five Years.

title: Jasa Armada Indonesia Completes Sale Of 3.39 Million Buyback Shares, Raising Rp1.03 Billion
body: Jasa Armada Indonesia Sold 3,391,100 Treasury Shares Acquired In A Buyback At An Average Price Of Rp305,552.5 Per Share, Generating Rp1.03 Billion In Tactical Funds. The Transaction, Facilitated By PT Bni Sekuritas And Reported By Company Secretary Eddy Haristiani, Concluded On 13 October 2025, Following A Buyback That Began On 1 October 2025 And Ended On 30 November 2025.

title: Pemeringkat Efek Indonesia Confirms Stable Idbbb+ Rating For J Resources Asia
body: Pemeringkat Efek Indonesia Has Confirmed A Stable Idbbb+ Rating For J Resources Asia, Citing Solid Mining Production, Moderate Financial Profile, And Stable Global Gold Demand. The Company Plans To Accelerate Repayment Of Its Usd41 Million Sustainable Bonds Using Internal Funds, While A Conditional Sale Of A Usd540 Million Gold Project Remains Pending, And Its Rating Could Improve Or Deteriorate Depending On Production Stability, Divestments, And Gold Price Movements.

title: Bliss Properti Returns Lombok City Center Building To Bank Sinarmas As Court Rulings Unfold
body: Bliss Properti Has Returned The 47,921‑M² Lombok City Center Building To Bank Sinarmas, Which Will Auction The Property To Pay The Debt Of Its Subsidiary Bliss Pembangunan Sejahtera. Court Rulings Have Sentenced Former Directors Azril Sopandi Of PT Patut Patuh Patju And Isabel Tanihaha Of Bliss Pembangunan Sejahtera To Prison Terms And Fines, With The Kso Partnership Having Caused Over Rp38 Billion In Losses To The State And Involving A 4.8‑Hectare Land Mortgage To Bank Sinarmas.

title: Gozco Plantations Rejects Rumors Of Acquisition By Energi Melayani Negeri, Shares Corrected 7.11% To Rp366
body: Gozco Plantations’ Corporate Secretary Liviana Said The Company Has Not Engaged With Energi Melayani Negeri And Will Disclose Any Material Information Per Regulations. The Shares Corrected 7.11% To Rp366 After A 136‑Point Rise Of 59.13% From Rp230 Earlier In The Week.

title: Cakra Bhakti Accumulates 1.14 Million Shares Of Steel Pipe Industry Indonesia At Rp402 Each, Raising Holdings To 57.32%
body: Cakra Bhakti Purchased 1,144,300 Shares Of Steel Pipe Industry Indonesia On 15 October 2025 At Rp402 Per Share, A Price 5.23% Above The Closing Price Of Rp382. The Transaction Increased His Stake To 4.11 Billion Shares, Or 57.32% Of The Company, Costing Him Rp460 Million.

title: Pertamina Geothermal Energy Expands Capacity And Esg Profile Amid Indonesia’S Energy Transition
body: Pertamina Geothermal Energy (Pge) Has Begun Operations Of Its 55‑Mw Pltp Lumut Balai Unit 2 And Started Construction Of A 55‑Mw Pltp Gunung Tiga, Aiming For 1 Gw Of Installed Capacity Within 2–3 Years And 1.8 Gw By 2033, While Also Advancing A Green‑Hydrogen Pilot And Achieving A Top‑50 Esg Ranking With 18 Gold Awards. The Company Now Manages 1,932 Mw Of Geothermal Capacity—727 Mw Directly And 1,205 Mw Under Joint‑Operation Contracts—Supplying Power To Over Two Million Households And Potentially Cutting 10 Million Tonnes Of Co₂ Annually.

title: PT Itsec Asia Tbk Director Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Purchases 8.5 Million Shares In Three Transactions
body: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Of PT Itsec Asia Tbk Bought 8.5 Million Shares Between 14–16 October 2025 At Prices Ranging From Rp1,175 To Rp1,300, Totaling Roughly Rp14.3 Billion And Raising His Stake From 165.95 Million To 174.58 Million Shares. Following The Transactions, Cybr Shares Gained 1.61 % To Rp1,260.

title: PT Futura Energi Global Tbk Mourns Loss Of Independent Commissioner Khairiansyah Salman, Announces No Material Impact On Operations
body: PT Futura Energi Global Tbk Reported The Death Of Its Independent Commissioner Khairiansyah Salman, Stating The Event Will Not Materially Affect Its Operations, Finances, Or Business Continuity, And That His Position Will Be Filled At An Upcoming Extraordinary General Meeting. The Company, Now Under New Controlling Owner PT Aurora Dhana Nusantara, Continues Its Green Energy Transformation, Expanding From Geothermal Projects In Central Java To A 130‑Mw Solar Plant In Bali In Partnership With Pln.

title: PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk Announces Majority Share Acquisition By PT Asia Investment Capital
body: Three Major Shareholders—Hardy Satya, Yohan Satya, And Dimas Adyasa Wirayatmaka—Signed A Conditional Share Sale Agreement On 17 October 2025 To Transfer 1.17 Billion Shares (70.96 % Of Paid‑Up Capital) To PT Asia Investment Capital, Which Would Become The Controlling Shareholder If All Conditions Are Met By 31 October 2025. The Transaction Is Still In Finalization And Management Has Not Yet Determined Its Impact On Operations, Legal Matters, Or Financial Condition.

title: Coco Shares Drop 14.38% As Bank Keb Hana Indonesia’S Holding Rises To 15.91% Amid Mahogany Global Investment Pte Ltd’S Sell‑Off
body: Coco Shares Fell 14.38% To Rp262 On Friday After Bank Keb Hana Indonesia Added 178.39 Million Shares, Boosting Its Stake To 15.91% Of The Company. Meanwhile, Mahogany Global Investment Pte Ltd Sold 65,494,786 Shares Between Oct 2–6 At Rp400–Rp472 Each, Raising Rp28.8 Billion, While PT Wahana Interfood Nusantara Tbk Posted A Net Loss Of Rp82.53 Billion For The First Half Of 2025.

title: PT Multi Medika Internasional Tbk To Distribute Up To 2.4 Billion Bonus Shares To Shareholders
body: PT Multi Medika Internasional Tbk (Mmix) Will Issue Up To 2,400,212,690 Bonus Shares At A Nominal Value Of Rp25 Each, With A 1:1 Ratio, Following A Capital Increase Of Rp60,005 Billion, And Will Adjust Its Basic And Fully Paid‑Up Capital To Rp120,016 Billion. The Bonus Distribution Will Be Cum On 23 October 2025, Ex On 24 October 2025, And Cum Cash On 28 October 2025, While The Stock Has Risen 7.14% In The Last Month And 303% Year‑To‑Date.

title: PT Bank Negara Indonesia Tbk Wins Green Warrior Award For Mangrove Regeneration Initiative
body: PT Bank Negara Indonesia Tbk (Bni) Earned The Green Warrior Award At The Esg Now Awards 2025 For Its Mangrove Regeneration Program In Teluk Pangpang, Banyuwangi, Which Boosts Fisher Welfare And Restores Coastal Ecosystems. The Bank Plans To Expand Green Projects, Including Renewable Energy And Community Capacity Building, To Further Embed Esg Principles In Its Operations.

title: PT Infiniti Wahana Sell Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 20, 2025 (WIB), PT Infiniti Wahana sold shares of Steady Safe Tbk (SAFE.JK) at approximately IDR 190, decreasing holdings from 247,726,713 to 247,676,713. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

body: According to the published announcement on October 20, 2025 (WIB), Yentoro bought shares of PT Jasnita Telekomindo Tbk (JAST.JK) at approximately IDR 87, increasing holdings from 44,517,200 to 44,733,300. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Transmigration Minister Calls For Revision Of Law 29/2009 To Promote Inclusive Economic Growth
body: Minister Muhammad Iftitah Sulaiman Suryanagara Announced Plans To Revise Indonesia’s Law 29/2009 On Transmigration, Adding An Economic Growth Dimension To Article 32 And Emphasizing Self‑Sufficiency, Community Empowerment, And Job Creation To Reduce Regional Disparities. The Revision, Supported By The Human‑Rights Ministry, Aims To Translate The Program Into Concrete Measures That Boost Local Industries And Household Purchasing Power In Provinces Such As Central Sulawesi And North Maluku.

title: Bursa Efek Indonesia Suspends Trading Of PT Estée Gold Feet Tbk Amid Rapid Share Price Surge
body: The Indonesian Stock Exchange Has Temporarily Halted Trading Of PT Estée Gold Feet Tbk Shares On Monday As The Stock’s Cumulative Price Rose Sharply, Prompting A Cooling‑Down Measure To Protect Investors. The Shares Have Surged 59.23% In The Past Week, 89.72% In The Past Month, And 373.45% Year‑To‑Date, And Trading Will Resume After A Further Announcement.

title: Bukit Asam Reports Solid Operational Performance With 9% Production Growth To 35.90 Mt In Q3 2025
body: Bukit Asam (Ptba) Recorded A 9% Increase In Coal Production To 35.90 Million Tonnes In The First Nine Months Of 2025, Driven Largely By A 21% Contribution From Its Mining Services Subsidiary PT Satria Bahana Sarana. Sales Rose 8% To 33.70 Million Tonnes, With 56% Sold Domestically, While Freight Volumes Grew 8% To 30.02 Million Tonnes, Bolstering The Company’s Resilience Amid Falling Global Coal Prices.

title: Karya Permata Sells 1.695 Billion Shares Of Diamond Citra Propertindo, Raising Rp295.27 Billion
body: On 14 October 2025, Karya Permata Divested 1.695 Billion Shares Of Diamond Citra Propertindo At Prices Ranging From Rp155 To Rp232 Per Share, Generating Rp295.27 Billion. The Sale Reduced Karya Permata’s Holding To 2.81 Billion Shares (37.9%) From 3.95 Billion (53.2%) Before The Transaction, A 15.3% Dilution.

title: Prabowo Announces Plan To Produce Fully Indonesian-Made Cars By 2028
body: President Prabowo Subianto Announced At A Cabinet Meeting That Indonesia Will Begin Building A Domestic Car Factory, With Funding And Land Already Allocated, Aiming For Production Within Three Years. He Also Highlighted The Successful Domestic Production Of Maung Tactical Vehicles By State‑Owned PT Pindad And Noted The Free Nutritious Meals Program Has Benefited 36.7 Million People.

title: Indonesia’S Government Launches Waste‑To‑Energy Program With Danantara Leading Projects
body: Indonesia’s Energy Mineral Resources Minister Bahlil Lahadalia Announced The Implementation Of Presidential Regulation No. 109/2025, Which Mandates Environmentally Friendly Waste‑To‑Energy Technology And Designates Danantara As The Lead Manager For Projects. The Regulation Sets A Fixed Tariff Of Us$0.20 Per Kwh For 30 Years, Obligating Pln To Purchase The Generated Electricity, And Aims To Streamline Licensing, Funding, And Investor Confidence In The Country’s Clean‑Energy Transition.

title: Indonesia Accelerates Rice Field Development In Eastern Regions To Stabilize Prices And Achieve Food Self‑Sufficiency
body: Indonesia’s Agriculture Ministry Announced A Plan To Expand 225,000 Hectares Of Rice Fields This Year, Targeting 400,000 Hectares In 2026, In The Eastern Provinces Of Papua, Maluku And East Nusa Tenggara To Curb Rising Prices And Strengthen Food Security. The Move Complements President Prabowo Subianto’s Food‑Self‑Sufficiency Agenda, With The Sphp Market Operation Expected To Run Until Early 2026 And A Consumer Price Of Rp12,531 Per Kilogram Just Above The Rp12,500 Ceiling.

title: Bursa Efek Indonesia Suspends Trading Of PT Berkah Prima Perkasa Tbk Shares Amid Rapid Price Surge
body: The Indonesia Stock Exchange Temporarily Halted Trading Of PT Berkah Prima Perkasa Tbk (Blue) Shares On 21 October 2025 After The Stock Surged 24.71% To Rp1,640 Per Share, Marking A 103.73% Weekly Rise And A 382.35% Year‑To‑Date Gain. The Suspension Aims To Cool The Market And Protect Investors While The Exchange Awaits Further Announcements.

title: Noel Aelyo Laras Kusuma Negara Increases Shareholding In PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk. To 1.54%
body: Noel Aelyo Laras Kusuma Negara, A Commissioner Of PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk., Bought 2.5 Million Shares At Rp970 Each, Raising His Stake From 1.486% To 1.54% For A Total Transaction Value Of About Rp2.42 Billion. On Monday, PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk. Shares Gained 1.56% To Rp975 Per Share.

title: PT Harta Djaya Karya Tbk Sees Share Count Rise To 1,918,610,226 Amid Warrant Conversions In October 2025
body: PT Harta Djaya Karya Tbk Increased Its Outstanding Shares To 1,918,610,226 In October 2025 After Issuing 349,291 New Shares Through Warrant Conversions, With 478,889,774 Warrants Remaining. The Company’s Investor Base Grew From 3,808 To 5,300, And Management Urged Holders To Convert Before The 11 February 2026 Expiry To Strengthen Capital For Interior Design And Furniture Manufacturing Expansion.

title: Madhani Talatah Nusantara Sells 105 Million Shares Of Darma Henwa, Reducing Its Stake To 5.81%
body: Madhani Talatah Nusantara Sold 105 Million Shares Of Darma Henwa At An Average Price Of Rp75 Per Share, Raising Rp7.87 Billion And Cutting Its Ownership From 6.07% To 5.81% (A 0.26% Reduction). The Divestment Was Carried Out For Internal Purposes, According To Darma Henwa Director & Corporate Secretary Mukson Arif Rosyidi.

title: Lo Kheng Hong Accumulates 1.8 Million Shares Of Abm Investama, Boosting Holding To 5.58%
body: On 17 October 2025, Lo Kheng Hong Accumulated 1,800,500 Shares Of Abm Investama Through A Silent Block Trade Involving Brokers Such As Mandiri Sekuritas, Ekokapital Sekuritas, Anugerah Sekuritas Indonesia, Rhb Sekuritas Indonesia, Ocbc Sekuritas Indonesia, Korean Investment Sekuritas Indonesia, Pluang Maju Sekuritas, Sinarmas Sekuritas, Mnc Sekuritas, Panin Sekuritas, And Bca Sekuritas, Raising His Holding To 153.5 Million Shares (5.58%). The Purchase, Valued At Roughly Rp4.62 Billion Based On The Closing Price Of Rp2,570 Per Share, Increased His Stake From 151.3 Million Shares (5.50%).

title: Indonesia Kendaraan Terminal Posts Rp190.29 Billion Net Profit For Quarter Ended 30 September 2025
body: Indonesia Kendaraan Terminal Reported Net Income Of Rp190.29 Billion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, A 28.53% Increase From The Same Period Last Year, Lifting Basic Earnings Per Share To Rp104.65 From Rp81.40. Operating Income Rose 12.7% To Rp660.24 Billion, While Total Assets Climbed To Rp1.92 Trillion And Equity To Rp1.34 Trillion.

title: Happy Hapsoro Divests 709.8 Million Shares Of Bukit Uluwatu At A Premium Price
body: Happy Hapsoro Sold 709.826.076 Shares Of Bukit Uluwatu At An Average Price Of Rp815 Per Share, About 8.66% Above The Closing Price Of Rp750 On 15 October 2025, Raising Rp578.5 Billion. The Sale Reduced His Holdings To 110.84 Million Shares, A 3.45% Dilution From The Pre‑Transaction Total Of 820.67 Million Shares, And Was Said To Realize Investment Gains And Portfolio Rebalancing.

title: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk. Announces Share Buyback Program To Support Stock Stability
body: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk. Has Announced A Share Buyback Program With A Maximum Value Of Rp5 Trillion To Be Executed Between 22 October 2025 And 19 January 2026, Stating It Will Have No Material Impact On Financial Performance. Shares Of Bca Rose 5% To Rp7.875 On The Day Of Announcement, Up 8.25% Over The Past Week From Rp7.275 On 12 October 2025.

title: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk Reports 7.6% Credit Growth And 5.7% Net Profit Increase In First Nine Months Of 2025
body: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk (Bca) Posted A 7.6% Year‑On‑Year Rise In Total Credit To Rp944 Trillion And A 5.7% Increase In Net Profit To Rp43.4 Trillion For The First Nine Months Of 2025, While Keeping Its Loan‑At‑Risk Ratio At 5.5% And Boosting Sustainable‑Sector Lending By 12.7% To Rp241 Trillion. The Bank Also Extended Its Bca Expo 2025 To 31 October, Attracted More Than 4.5 Million Hybrid Visitors To The Bca Wealth Summit 2025, And Saw Bca Syariah Gold Financing Grow 161.2% Yoy.

title: PT Infiniti Wahana Sells 260,000 Shares Of PT Steady Safe Tbk., Cutting Its Stake To 40.23%
body: On 16 October 2025, PT Infiniti Wahana Sold 210,000 Shares Of PT Steady Safe Tbk. At Rp186–Rp190 Each, And On 14 October 2025 Sold 50,000 Shares At Rp190, Totaling About Rp45.2 Million And Reducing Its Holding To 40.23% Of Steady Safe. The Sale Caused Steady Safe Shares To Fall 1.06% To Rp185 On Monday Trading.

title: Grup Astra’S PT Acset Indonusa Tbk To Sell 23.53% Of PT Dredging International Indonesia To Ejk For Rp20 Billion
body: Grup Astra’s PT Acset Indonusa Tbk Has Signed A Conditional Sale Agreement To Sell 400 Shares (23.53% Of Dii) Of PT Dredging International Indonesia To Ejk For Rp20 Billion, With The Shares To Be Converted Into Series B Shares. The Transaction, Expected To Close By 22 October 2025, Is Part Of Acst’s Portfolio Restructuring To Focus On Construction And Is Not Expected To Materially Affect Acst’s Operations Or Financial Condition.

title: Apexindo Pratama Duta Secures Usd13.6 Million Offshore Drilling Contract With PT Pertamina Hulu Mahakam
body: Apexindo Pratama Duta Has Signed A Usd13.6 Million Offshore Drilling Contract With PT Pertamina Hulu Mahakam, Effective 20 October 2025, For Operations In The Delta Mahakam Area Of East Kalimantan. The Seven‑Year Agreement Is Expected To Boost Rig Utilisation And Operational Revenue Without Negatively Affecting The Company’s Operations, Legal Standing, Financial Condition, Or Business Continuity.

title: Telkom Indonesia Completes Rp35.78 Trillion Conditional Spin-Off With Telkom Infrastruktur Indonesia
body: On October 20, 2025, Telkom Indonesia Executed A Conditional Spin-Off Agreement With Telkom Infrastruktur Indonesia, Transferring Wholesale Fiber Connectivity Assets In A Rp35.78 Trillion Transaction Aimed At Corporate Restructuring And Business Focus. The Deal, Which Involves Packaging 99.9999997% Of Tif Shares, Is Expected To Have No Significant Impact On Telkom Indonesia’s Financial Condition, According To Svp Corporate Secretary Jati Widagdo.

title: Iphone 17 Launch Drives Strong Demand, Boosting Erayaya Swasembada’S Q4 2025 Profit Outlook
body: The Midnight Launch Of Iphone 17 At Ibox In Senayan City Drew Enthusiastic Crowds And Early Queues, Indicating Robust Consumer Demand. Verdhana Sekuritas Indonesia’s Analyst Jody Indra Wijaya Projects That Erayaya Swasembada Will See A Strong Q4 2025 Profit Surge Driven By The Iphone 17 Launch, Improved Same‑Store Sales Growth, And Its Expanding Smart‑Lifestyle And Electric‑Vehicle Business, Including A New Xpeng Dealer In Pondok Indah.

title: Adi Sarana Armada Reports 21% Revenue Growth To Rp4.41 Trillion, Driven By Logistics And Used‑Car Ecosystem Expansion
body: Adi Sarana Armada’s Revenue Rose 21% To Rp4.41 Trillion In The First Nine Months Of 2025, With Logistics Contributing Rp1.9 Trillion (Up 39%) And The Used‑Car Segment Generating Rp806.7 Billion (Up 24%). Net Profit Climbed 63.9% To Rp348.60 Billion, While The Company Expands Its Logistics Network, Cold‑Chain Facilities, And Caroline.Id Outlets To 17 Locations.

title: Karya Permata Reduces Its Stake In Diamond Citra To 37.9% While Maintaining Control
body: Karya Permata Sold 1.14 Billion Shares Of Diamond Citra, Cutting Its Ownership From 53.2 % (3.95 Billion Shares) To 37.9 % (2.81 Billion Shares) As Of 14 Oct 2025, Yet The Company Says It Will Remain The Controlling Shareholder And Continue To Support Diamond Citra’s Strategic Development. The Proceeds Are Earmarked For Strengthening The Capital Structure, Improving Cash Flow, Funding Working‑Capital Needs For The Apple 3 Project And Expanding Residential Property Ventures, With No Plans To Change Control Within The Next 12 Months.

title: Indonesia Stock Exchange Suspends Trading Of Five Shares Amid Rapid Price Surges
body: Indonesia's Bursa Efek Indonesia Temporarily Halted Trading Of PT Globe Kita Terang Tbk., PT Wahana Pronatural Tbk., PT Pembangunan Graha Lestari Indah Tbk., PT Mora Telematika Indonesia Tbk., And PT Triniti Dinamik Tbk. After Rapid Cumulative Price Increases, With Mora Up 32.3% In A Week And Wahana Pronatural Up 79.1% In A Week, And Some Stocks Facing A Second Suspension And Potential Full Call Auction Monitoring For Up To A Week.

title: Gunanusa Reports Q3 2025 Net Profit Of Rp48.01 Billion, Up 37% Yoy
body: Gunanusa's Q3 2025 Earnings Saw Net Profit Rise To Rp48.01 Billion, A 37.05% Increase From The Same Period Last Year, While Sales Climbed 21.35% To Rp1.25 Trillion. Operating Profit Jumped To Rp104.26 Billion, And Total Assets Reached Rp1.11 Trillion, Up From Rp980.13 Billion At Year‑End 2024.

title: PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya Buy Shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 21, 2025 (WIB), PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya bought shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at approximately IDR 1,320, increasing holdings from 99,666,400 to 99,751,200. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

body: According to the published announcement on October 22, 2025 (WIB), PT Buana Graha Utama bought shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk (MICE.JK) at approximately IDR 490, increasing holdings from 286,021,618 to 286,162,118. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Bukit Asam Tbk Reports 9% Increase In Q3 2025 Coal Production And Strong Sales Amid Rising Global Prices
body: In Q3 2025, PT Bukit Asam Tbk Produced 35.9 Million Tons Of Coal, Up 9% From 32.97 Million Tons In The Same Period Last Year, With Mining Services Subsidiary PT Satria Bahana Sarana Contributing 21% Of Total Output. Coal Sales Rose 8% To 33.7 Million Tons, 56% Of Which Was Absorbed Domestically, While Transport Volumes Increased 8% To 30.02 Million Tons, Reflecting A Recovering Global Price Environment.

title: Cngr Advanced Material Co To Open Precursor Plant In Setangga Special Economic Zone In December 2025 After Us Ira Delay
body: Cngr Advanced Material Co Will Begin Operating Its Precursor Plant At Setangga Special Economic Zone, Tanah Bumbu Regency, South Kalimantan In December 2025, A Delay From Its Original 2021 Plan Due To The Us Inflation Reduction Act. The Company Cited Expanding Ev Markets And Advanced Asian Processing Technology As Reasons For The New Location, With The 668.3‑Hectare Zone Targeting Idr 67.69 Trillion In Investment And Hosting Smelter, Biodiesel, And Other Industries.

title: Indonesia Bans Bauxite Exports To Spur Domestic Smelting And Attract $8 Billion In Downstream Investment
body: Indonesia’s Ban On Raw Bauxite Exports, Announced In June 2023, Aims To Boost Domestic Smelting Capacity—Currently 17.5 Million Tons Per Year—By Attracting Investors To Build Smelters, Especially In West Kalimantan, And To Meet A Domestic Demand That Still Relies On Imports. The Government Targets $8 Billion In Downstream Mineral Investment, With About $4 Billion Already Realized, As Part Of President Prabowo Subianto’s Broader Industrialization Program.

title: PT Bumi Resources Tbk Acquires 99.68% Of Australian Mining Company Wolfram Limited, Expanding Into Non-Coal Commodities
body: PT Bumi Resources Tbk Has Purchased 126,599,340 Shares Of Wolfram Limited, Giving It 99.68% Ownership For Idr 696.77 Billion (Aud 6.39 Million) With A Final 0.32% To Be Paid By End‑October 2025, Bringing Total Transaction Value To Idr 698.98 Billion (Aud 6.35 Million). The Acquisition Positions Bumi As A Holder Of 100% Of Wfl Shares, With Gold Production Expected To Start In June 2026 And Reach 75,000–100,000 Troy Ounces Annually, While The Company Plans Further Non‑Coal Asset Purchases In Indonesia Or Australia Within The Next 6–12 Months.

title: Indonesia Launches Infrastructure Project Facilitation Office To Attract Global Investment
body: Indonesia Has Inaugurated An Infrastructure Project Facilitation Office (Ipfo) To Streamline Investment In 46 Strategic Projects Across Transportation, Energy, Water, Waste Management, Housing, And Smart Cities. The Office Aims To Increase Private Sector Participation From 28% Toward The Rp10,300 Trillion ($643.8 Billion) Infrastructure Funding Required For 2025–2029.

title: Indonesia Aims To End Salt Imports By 2027, Targets 5 Million Tons Production At Rote Ndao
body: Coordinating Minister Food Affairs Zulkifli Hasan And Maritime Affairs Fisheries Minister Sakti Wahyu Trenggono Said Indonesia Will No Longer Need To Import Salt By The End Of 2027, With The National Salt Industry Center In Rote Ndao Set To Produce 5 Million Tons. The Government Has Allocated Rp2 Trillion (About Us$120.5 Million) For The K‑Sign Development, Which Could Create More Than 26,600 Jobs And Boost Local Economies.

title: Indonesia Targets 51% Waste Management This Year And Nationwide Waste‑To‑Energy Projects Under New Regulation No. 109/2025
body: Deputy Minister Diaz Hendropriyono Highlighted President Prabowo Subianto’s Push To Link Waste Management To Food Security, Announcing A Goal To Properly Manage 51% Of Indonesia’s Waste This Year And Achieve Full Nationwide Waste Management By 2029 Under Regulation No. 109/2025. The Sovereign Wealth Fund Danantara Has Been Tasked With Overseeing Investment In Waste‑To‑Energy Projects Across Sites Such As Sleman, Denpasar, Bogor, And Medan.

title: Indonesia’S Ministry Of Creative Economy Drives Local Government Offices To Boost Creative Industry Growth
body: Minister Teuku Riefky Harsya Announced That About 28 Provinces And 80 Districts Are Establishing Local Creative Economy Offices To Support Sectors Like Fashion, Culinary, And Crafts, Aiming To Expand Exports To Europe, The Middle East, And America While Strengthening Domestic Competitiveness. The Initiative Is Expected To Create Jobs, Increase Indonesia’s Gdp Contribution, And Attract Investment In The Creative Economy, Which Already Accounts For More Than 7% Of The National Gdp.

title: Indonesia Stock Exchange Ends PT Timah Tbk Suspension And Switches To Full Call Auction
body: The Bursa Efek Indonesia Lifted The One‑Week Suspension On PT Timah Tbk Shares And Moved The Stock To A Full Call Auction (Fca) Category 10 To Curb Volatility After A Sharp Price Jump. PT Timah Tbk Shares Fell 9.72% To Rp2,600 On Wednesday, Having Risen 136.36% From Rp1,100 On 22 September 2025, And Had Previously Surged 144.13% From Rp1,065 On 22 July 2025.

title: Panca Mitra Multiperdana Cuts 132 Jobs Amid Shrimp Export Tariffs And Seeks New Revenue Streams
body: The Company Has Laid Off 58 Monthly And 74 Daily Workers As Sales Slump From U.S. Anti‑Dumping And Reciprocal Tariffs On Indonesian Shrimp Erodes Cash Flow. It Plans To Lease A Plant To PT Landangan Makmur Situbondo Under A Profit‑Sharing Model And Is Preparing To Obtain A U.S. Food Drug Administration‑Approved Cesium‑137‑Free Export Certificate.

title: Formosa Ingredient Reports 37% Increase In Q3 2025 Net Profit To Rp16.7 Billion
body: Formosa Ingredient Reported A 37.22% Rise In Net Profit To Rp16.7 Billion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, With Basic Eps Climbing To Rp14 From Rp11 And Sales Increasing 2.79% To Rp132.83 Billion. The Company Also Saw Gross Profit Jump 19.07% To Rp45.88 Billion, Operating Profit Rise To Rp21.63 Billion, And A Reduction In Total Liabilities To Rp15.99 Billion, While Equity Grew To Rp167.58 Billion.

title: Sidomulyo Selaras Approves Share Conversion And Private Placement To Reduce Debt
body: Sidomulyo Selaras Converted 1.13 Billion Shares To Nominal Rp100 And Authorized New Series B Shares Nominal Rp50. A Rp61.35 Billion Private Placement Will Issue 1.11 Billion New Shares At Rp55 Each To Convert Debt To Equity With Tjoe Mien Sasminto, Reducing Outstanding Debt To Rp76.39 Billion And Improving The Debt‑To‑Equity Ratio From 517.56 % To 58.59 %.

title: Merdeka Gold Resources Completes Ore Preparation Plant Ahead Of 2025 Commissioning And 2026 Gold Pour
body: Merdeka Gold Resources Finished Constructing Its Ore Preparation Plant At The Pani Gold Mine, With Commissioning Slated For November 2025 And The First Heap Leach Stacking Expected The Same Month, Followed By The First Gold Pour In 2026. The Company Also Reports An Increased Gold Resource Estimate Of 4.8 Million Ounces, Underscoring Its Commitment To Sustainable Mining Practices And Local Economic Contribution.

title: PT Bukit Asam Tbk. Launches Two Irrigation Solar Power Plants In Muara Enim, Sumatra Selatan
body: PT Bukit Asam Tbk. (Ptba) Inaugurated Two 11.8 Kwp Irrigation Solar Power Plants In Desa Matas And Desa Tanjung Agung, Each Covering 20 Hectares And Expected To Double Or Triple Farmers' Harvests, Benefiting 1,169 Farmers Across 639 Hectares. The Company Plans Three Additional Projects In Muara Gula Baru, Kepur, And Muara Lawai Seberang To Further Support Clean Energy Transition And Farmer Welfare.

title: PT Prima Multi Usaha Indonesia Tbk. Reports 26% Net Profit Increase Despite 5.4% Sales Decline
body: For The Nine Months Ended September 30, 2025, Net Profit Attributable To The Parent Rose 26% Yoy To Rp33.73 Billion While Net Sales Fell 5.4% To Rp2.82 Trillion; Operating Profit And Profit Before Tax Grew 16.8% And 22.6% Respectively, And Liabilities Dropped 67.6% After The Removal Of Other Liabilities. The Company's Total Assets Rose 15.9% To Rp531.15 Billion And Its Shares Closed Up 6.9% At Rp155, Up 12.32% Over The Week And 25% Over Three Months.

title: Indonesia'S Bursa Efek Removes Full Call Auction Status For PT Tanah Laut Tbk And PT Jaya Sukses Makmur Sentosa Tbk, Effective From Tuesday Session
body: Bursa Efek Indonesia Officially Removed The Full Call Auction Status For PT Tanah Laut Tbk And PT Jaya Sukses Makmur Sentosa Tbk, Effective From The Tuesday Trading Session, After A Week Of Suspension That Began On Friday. Following The Change, Rise Shares Jumped To The Daily Upper Limit, Rising 19.67% To Rp7,300 Per Share, While Indx Shares Climbed 34.18% To Rp212 Before Market Close.

title: Summarecon Agung Tbk Reports Rp772.31 Bn Affiliate Capital Increase, Shares Rise 2.06%
body: PT Summarecon Agung Tbk. Disclosed Affiliate Transactions Totaling Rp772.31 Bn, With PT Serpong Cahaya Harmoni Injecting Rp583.38 Bn Into PT Serpong Cipta Kreasi And Rp388.92 Bn Into PT Variatata, Approved On 17 October 2025. The Moves, Aimed At Strengthening Capital Structure And Synergies, Were Said To Pose No Conflict Of Interest, And Smra Shares Gained 2.06% To Rp396.

title: Darmawan Suryadi Sm Buy Shares of PT Armada Berjaya Trans Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 22, 2025 (WIB), Darmawan Suryadi Sm bought shares of PT Armada Berjaya Trans Tbk (JAYA.JK) at approximately IDR 99, increasing holdings from 155,865,730 to 158,088,530. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Bank Of Singapore LIMITED Buy Shares of Bayu Buana Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 21, 2025 (WIB), Bank Of Singapore LIMITED bought shares of Bayu Buana Tbk (BAYU.JK) at approximately IDR 1,300, increasing holdings from 23,387,900 to 23,427,900. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya Sell Shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 21, 2025 (WIB), PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya sold shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at approximately IDR 1,320, decreasing holdings from 108,345,400 to 99,666,400. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Kundy Wijaya Sell Shares of PT Kusuma Kemindo Sentosa Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 21, 2025 (WIB), Kundy Wijaya sold shares of PT Kusuma Kemindo Sentosa Tbk (KKES.JK) at approximately IDR 32, decreasing holdings from 85,585,300 to 85,124,600. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Arsari Tambang Plans Major Expansion By Acquiring Canadian Mining Business
body: President Director Arsari Tambang, Aryo Djojohadikusumo, Announced The Company’s Plan To Acquire A Mining Business In Canada, With An Estimated Value Of Idr 7 Trillion, As Part Of A Broader Cooperation Under The Indonesia–European Union Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement. The Acquisition Is Expected To Be Finalized By June 2026 Once Financial Close Is Achieved.
