body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), Martin Suharlie bought shares of PT M Cash Integrasi Tbk (MCAS.JK) at approximately IDR 876, increasing holdings from 69,753,600 to 69,932,800. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Benteng Terang Sejahtera Sell Shares of Bumi Citra Permai Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), PT Benteng Terang Sejahtera sold shares of Bumi Citra Permai Tbk (BCIP.JK) at approximately IDR 113, increasing holdings from 4,210,000 to 69,229,900. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Dimas Adiyasa Wiryaatmaja Sell Shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), Dimas Adiyasa Wiryaatmaja sold shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk (SOFA.JK) at approximately IDR 346,500,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Asia Investment Capital Buy Shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), PT Asia Investment Capital bought shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk (SOFA.JK) at approximately IDR 24,643,500,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Yohan Satya Sell Shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), Yohan Satya sold shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk (SOFA.JK) at approximately IDR 12,148,500,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Hardy Satya Sell Shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), Hardy Satya sold shares of PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk (SOFA.JK) at approximately IDR 12,148,500,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Bank Of Singapore LIMITED Buy Shares of Pioneerindo Gourmet International Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), Bank Of Singapore LIMITED bought shares of Pioneerindo Gourmet International Tbk (PTSP.JK) at approximately IDR 930, increasing holdings from 17,634,220 to 17,637,920. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Mark Dynamics Announces Interim Dividend Of Idr 76 Billion For Fy 2025
body: Mark Dynamics Will Distribute An Interim Dividend Of Idr 76 Billion, Representing 37.25% Of Its Net Profit Of Idr 204.12 Billion For The Nine Months Ended September 30 2025, At Idr 20 Per Share. The Dividend Will Be Recorded On November 7 2025 With Payment Scheduled For November 27 2025.

title: Indonesia Targets 32% 5G Coverage By 2030 Amid Current 10% Availability
body: Indonesia Aims To Expand 5G Network Coverage To 32% By 2030, With Current Availability Below 10%, While 4G Already Reaches 97% Of Residential Areas But Internet Speeds Remain Low. The Government Plans To Bid Four Frequency Bands, Focus On Spectrum, Infrastructure, And Regulations, And Deploy Satellite-Based Connectivity To Support 5G Access In Remote Regions.

title: Himbaara Banks To Remain Selective In Financing Merah Putih Village Cooperatives Despite Government Guarantees
body: State‑Owned Lenders Under The Himbara Group Will Continue To Be Selective In Extending Credit To Merah Putih Village And Urban Cooperatives, Citing Lack Of Business Track Records, Weak Financial Governance, And Unclear First‑Loss Guarantee Details, According To Macroeconomics Analyst M. Rizal Taufikurahman. The Government Has Earmarked Rp216 Trillion For The Program, With A Rp200 Trillion Allocation And Rp16 Trillion Reserve, And Aims To Tie Lending To Performance, While A Blended‑Finance Model Involving Danantara, Jamkrindo, And Askrindo Is Proposed To Cover Risk Layers.

title: Bursa Efek Indonesia Reopens Trading Of PT Soho Global Health Tbk After Suspension, Shares Surge To Auto-Rejection Level
body: After A One‑Day Suspension Due To A Significant Cumulative Price Jump, Trading Of PT Soho Global Health Tbk Resumed On 28 October 2025 And The Shares Climbed To The Auto‑Rejection Level At Rp2,040, Up 24.77% (45 Points). The Stock Has Posted Remarkable Gains, Rising 74.36% In The Past Week, 166.67% In The Last Month, 195.65% Over Three Months, And 221.26% Year‑To‑Date From The January 2025 Opening Price.

title: Bumi Serpong Damai Reports 4% Yoy Growth In Q3 2025 Pre‑Sales, Reaching 71% Of Annual Target
body: In Q3 2025, Bumi Serpong Damai Recorded Rp7.10 Trillion In Pre‑Sales, Up 4% From Rp6.84 Trillion In The Same Period Last Year, Accounting For 71% Of Its Rp10 Trillion Annual Target. Residential And Commercial Segments Led The Growth, With Residential Pre‑Sales At Rp3.14 Trillion (44%) And Commercial At Rp3.33 Trillion (47%), Driven By Projects Such As Nava Park, Hiera, And Bsd City.

title: Indonesia's Industry Minister Emphasizes Domestic Market Protection While Pursuing Export Expansion
body: Industry Minister Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmita Said Protecting The Domestic Market—Where 80% Of Indonesia's Industrial Output Is Consumed—Is The Top Priority, Calling For Stronger Tariffs, Non‑Tariff Barriers And Support For Local Components. He Also Urged Export Diversification, Especially In Battery‑Based Electric Vehicles, To Leverage Indonesia's Status As The World's Largest Nickel Producer And Move Beyond Raw‑Material Exports.

title: Kalbe Farma Reports 10.6% Net Profit Growth In First Nine Months Of 2025, Driven By Strong Prescription And Health Product Segments
body: Kalbe Farma Posted A 10.6% Increase In Net Profit To Rp2.6 Trillion For The First Nine Months Of 2025, With Net Sales Rising 7.2% To Rp26 Trillion And Gross Margin Improving To 40.6%. The Company Will Raise Its Dividend Payout To 50‑60% Of Net Profit, Maintain A Rp250 Billion Buy‑Back Program, And Target 6‑8% Sales And Profit Growth For The Full Year While Expanding Its Oncology, Biologics, And Specialty Drug Initiatives.

title: PT Bukit Uluwatu Villa Tbk Announces A Rp603.98 Billion Rights Issue In November 2025, With Majority Shareholder PT Nusantara Utama Investama Acting As Standby Buyer
body: The Company Will Issue 4.02 Billion New Shares At Rp150 Each, Representing 16.36% Of Total Equity, And Each Holder Of 225 Existing Shares Will Receive 44 Rights, With Trading Scheduled For 7–13 November 2025. Proceeds Will Fund The Settlement Of A PT Bukit Permai Properti Acquisition (Rp416.23 Bn), Land Development In Pecatu, Bali (Rp107.60 Bn), And A Capital Injection Into PT Bukit Bali Properti (Rp76.60 Bn), While The Firm Reported A 974.56% Rise In H1‑2025 Net Profit To Rp81.39 Bn.

title: Paninbank Reports A 4.4% Decline In Nine‑Month 2025 Net Profit Amid Higher Loan Loss Provisions
body: For The First Nine Months Of 2025, Paninbank Posted Net Profit Of Rp2.19 Trillion, Down 4.4% Yoy, With Earnings Per Share Falling To Rp87.98, While Total Equity Rose 3.2% To Rp57.88 Trillion And Liabilities Fell 12.3% To Rp154.56 Trillion. The Profit Dip Reflects A 35.12% Increase In Loan Loss Provisions To Rp1.22 Trillion, A 4.72% Drop In Total Loans To Rp141.99 Trillion, And A Stronger Capital Adequacy Ratio Of 37.47% And Loan‑Deposit Ratio Of 88.97% As Of 30 September 2025.

title: PT Koka Indonesia Tbk Identifies Mr. Chen Liwei As Ultimate Beneficial Owner Of Ningbo Lixing Enterprise Management Co. Ltd.
body: The Company Disclosed That Mr. Chen Liwei, Who Holds 50% Of Ningbo Lixing Enterprise Management Co. Ltd. (The Prospective New Controller), Will Exercise Full Strategic Control, While The Remaining 50% Is Owned By Mr. Youli Ye. PT Koka Indonesia Tbk Said The Acquisition Is Proceeding Pending Bei Approval, With A Planned Five‑Year Lock‑Up Of 78.5% Of The Shares And No Material Information That Could Affect Its Operations Or Finances.

title: PT Pelayaran Jaya Hidup Baru Tbk. Readies November 5 Ipo With 25% Public Float And Family-Dominated Ownership
body: PT Pelayaran Jaya Hidup Baru Tbk. Plans To List On The Indonesia Stock Exchange On 5 November, Offering 25 % Of Its Shares (About 480 Million Shares) To The Public While Founder‑Controlled Hero Gozali Will Keep A 37.5 % Stake. The Shareholding Is Concentrated Among Six Members Of The Gozali‑Tjandra Family, Subject To An Eight‑Month Lock‑Up For Them And A 12‑Month Control Lock‑Up For Hero, With Only One Independent Commissioner, Drs. Djunggu Harungguan Sitorus, Who Also Serves On PT Sillo Maritim Perdana Tbk.

title: PT Bank Mandiri Tbk Reports Solid Q3‑2025 Growth In Assets, Credit And Deposits Amid Global Economic Pressure
body: For The Quarter Ended September 2025, PT Bank Mandiri Tbk’s Consolidated Assets Rose 10.3% Year‑On‑Year To Rp2.563 Trillion And Credit Grew 11% To Rp1.764 Trillion, Outpacing The Industry’s 7.7% Credit Growth. The Bank’s Non‑Performing Loan Ratio Stood At 1.03% With A Coverage Ratio Of 271%, While Third‑Party Funds Increased 13% To Rp1.884 Trillion, Driven By Digital Channels Such As The Livin’ Super App.

title: PT Iforte Solusi Infotek Sell Shares of PT Inti Bangun Sejahtera Tbk
body: PT Iforte Solusi Infotek, an insider, sold 332,000 shares of PT Inti Bangun Sejahtera Tbk, reducing its holding from 1,350,586,095 to 1,350,254,095. The transaction occurred in the telecommunication sector, with a price of 5,100. The purpose of the transaction is not specified.

title: PT Harvest Capital International Buy Shares of PT Arkadia Digital Media Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), PT Harvest Capital International bought shares of PT Arkadia Digital Media Tbk (DIGI.JK) at approximately IDR 35, increasing holdings from 500,084,000 to 527,364,800. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Buana Graha Utama Buy Shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), PT Buana Graha Utama bought shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk (MICE.JK) at approximately IDR 500, increasing holdings from 286,162,118 to 286,182,418. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Hasmoro Buy Shares of PT Medikaloka Hermina Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 27, 2025 (WIB), Hasmoro bought shares of PT Medikaloka Hermina Tbk (HEAL.JK) at approximately IDR 1,500, increasing holdings from 743,297,089 to 744,197,089. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Mb Investment Management Pte. Ltd Sell Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 28, 2025 (WIB), Mb Investment Management Pte. Ltd sell shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,315, decreasing holdings from 1,768,694,857 to 1,768,500,057. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT United Tractors Tbk Cabang Banjarmasin Receives K3 Zero Accident Award 2025
body: PT United Tractors Tbk Cabang Banjarmasin Was Awarded The K3 Zero Accident Award 2025 By The South Kalimantan Provincial Government After Achieving Eight Million Hours Of Work Without Lost‑Time Accidents. The Company Highlighted Its Ongoing Commitment To Safety Culture And Plans To Strengthen K3 Standards Across Operations.

title: Pakuwon Jati Reports A Modest 3.6% Increase In Q3 2025 Net Profit To Rp1.72 Trillion
body: For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Pakuwon Jati Posted Net Profit Of Rp1.72 Trillion, Up 3.61% Year‑On‑Year, With Earnings Per Share Rising To Rp35.85 And Revenue Reaching Rp5.11 Trillion (A 6.9% Increase). The Company’s Gross Profit Grew To Rp2.83 Trillion, Equity Rose To Rp26.23 Trillion, Liabilities Fell To Rp9.83 Trillion, And Total Assets Increased To Rp36.07 Trillion.

title: Bank Permata Reports 3.6% Yoy Rise In Q3 2025 Net Profit To Rp2.88 Trillion
body: For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Bank Permata Posted A Net Profit Of Rp2.88 Trillion, Up 3.59% Year‑Over‑Year, With Earnings Per Share Rising To Rp80. Operating Income Grew 3.72% To Rp9.2 Trillion, While Total Assets, Liabilities, And Equity All Increased To Rp269.28 Trillion, Rp224 Trillion, And Rp45.27 Trillion Respectively.

title: Airasia Indonesia Reports 64.6% Increase In Quarterly Loss To Rp985.49 Billion
body: For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Airasia Indonesia Posted A Net Loss Of Rp985.49 Billion, 64.64 % Higher Than The Same Period A Year Earlier, Widening Loss Per Share To Rp92.23. Revenue Rose 2.03 % To Rp6.02 Trillion While Total Operating Expenses Grew To Rp6.49 Trillion, Resulting In A Deficit Of Rp16.82 Trillion And Total Liabilities Of Rp16.08 Trillion.

title: Bukalapak Reports Idr 2.9 Trillion Net Profit For Q3 2025, A 591% Yoy Increase
body: For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Bukalapak Posted A Net Profit Of Idr 2.9 Trillion, Up 591.5% From A Loss Of Idr 597 Billion A Year Earlier, Driving Earnings Per Share To Idr 30.77. Revenue Rose 39.2% To Idr 4.72 Trillion, While Total Assets Grew To Idr 26.14 Trillion And Equity To Idr 25.29 Trillion.

title: PT Akr Corporindo Tbk. Increases Paid‑Up Capital Of PT Anugerah Krida Retailindo To Rp1.05 Trillion
body: On 24 October 2025, PT Akr Corporindo Tbk. Fully Subscribed An Additional Rp8.4 Billion, Raising PT Anugerah Krida Retailindo's Paid‑Up Capital To Rp1.05 Trillion And Holding 99.99% Of Its Shares. The Funds Will Support The Subsidiary's Retail And Distribution Activities And Are Classified As A Non‑Material Affiliate Transaction Under Pojk No.17/2020.

title: PT Delta Giri Wacana Tbk. Reports Q3‑2025 Sales Rise And Profit Increase
body: The Company Recorded Sales Of Rp2.64 Trillion In Q3‑2025, Up 9.54% Yoy, With Gross Profit Rising 15.15% To Rp748.23 Billion And Net Profit Attributable To The Parent Climbing 10.87% To Rp103.31 Billion. Total Assets Grew 19.59% To Rp3.48 Trillion, Liabilities Rose 16.04% To Rp2.46 Trillion, And The Dgwg Share Price Slipped 1.44% To Rp410.

title: Andri Hutama Putra Sell Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 28, 2025 (WIB), Andri Hutama Putra sold shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,325, decreasing holdings from 21,132,100 to 21,032,100. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Indonesia’S Transmigration Program Drives Industrial Jobs And Poverty Reduction, Says Minister
body: Indonesia's Transmigration Minister Muhammad Iftitah Sulaiman Suryanagara Highlighted That The Government's Transmigration Program Is Driving Industrialization And Job Creation, Citing A 3,500‑Job Sugar Factory Run By PT Muria Sumba Manis Melolo In Melolo And A Rp1.2 Trillion Investment By Lx International In East Kalimantan, While Noting Poverty Rates In Melolo Fell From 32% To 27%. The Ministry Also Seeks To Secure 13,000 Transmigration Land Certificates In 2025 And Is Exploring Partnerships With Wuhan Guoying Seed Co., Ltd. To Develop Agriculture‑Industry‑Based Tourism Villages.

title: PT Pp Presisi Tbk Secures Idr 150 Billion Nickel Mining Contract And Reports Record Q3 2025 Profit Surge
body: PT Pp Presisi Tbk Announced A New Idr 150 Billion Contract To Lease Heavy Equipment For Nickel Mining In North Konawe, Southeast Sulawesi, Strengthening Its Mining Services Portfolio, While The Company Posted A Q3 2025 Net Profit Of Idr 104.9 Billion—An 1,280 % Jump From The Previous Year—Driven By A 91.1 % Construction Revenue Share And A 1,668.2 % Increase In Mining Segment Contribution To Idr 191.1 Billion.

title: Indonesia Prepares Regulation To Protect App-Based Motorcycle Taxi Drivers
body: Indonesia's Ministry Of Manpower Announced That A Forthcoming Presidential Regulation Will Prioritize The Protection Of App-Based Motorcycle Taxi (Ojol) Drivers, Including Workplace Accident Death Insurance And Ensuring Transparent, Equal Relationships With Ride‑Hailing Firms. The Draft, Still Under Review By Multiple Ministries And Stakeholders, Is Expected To Be Finalized By The End Of The Year.

title: Indonesia Stock Exchange Suspends Trading Of PT Menn Teknologi Indonesia Tbk, PT Soho Global Health Tbk, PT Puri Global Sukses Tbk And PT Sunson Textile Manufacture Tbk Due To Price Spikes And Doubts Over Menn'S Continuity
body: Bei Halted Trading Of The Four Listed Companies, Citing Concerns About PT Menn Teknologi Indonesia Tbk's Going‑Concern Status And Extreme Price Surges That Pushed PT Soho Global Health Tbk, PT Puri Global Sukses Tbk And PT Sunson Textile Manufacture Tbk To Their Daily Upper Limits. The Suspended Stocks Will Be Moved To A Special Monitoring Board, With Soho And Puri To Be Traded Via A Full‑Call Auction Scheme For Up To A Week After The Suspension Is Lifted.

title: Cisadane Sawit Raya Reports 70.6% Yoy Increase In Net Profit To Rp213.92 Billion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025
body: Cisadane Sawit Raya Posted A Net Profit Of Rp213.92 Billion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Up 70.6% From Rp125.39 Billion A Year Earlier, While Basic Earnings Per Share Fell To Rp10 From Rp61. Net Sales Rose 77.3% To Rp1.33 Trillion, And Total Assets And Equity Increased To Rp2.53 Trillion And Rp1.5 Trillion Respectively.

title: Blue Bird Posts Rp482.59 Billion Net Profit For Q3 2025, Up 10.6% Yoy
body: For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Blue Bird Recorded Net Profit Of Rp482.59 Billion, Raising Basic Eps To Rp193 And Revenue To Rp4.11 Trillion, A 12.29% Increase From The Prior Year. Total Assets Grew To Rp9.23 Trillion, Liabilities To Rp3.05 Trillion, And Equity To Rp6.17 Trillion.

title: Triputra Agro Reports Net Profit Of Rp2.67 Trillion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, Up 65.8% Yoy
body: Triputra Agro Posted A Net Profit Of Rp2.67 Trillion For The Quarter Ended 30 September 2025, A 65.83% Increase Year‑On‑Year, With Basic Eps Rising To Rp135 From Rp81. Revenue Grew 31.41% To Rp8.2 Trillion, While Total Assets Reached Rp14.46 Trillion And Liabilities Fell To Rp2.78 Trillion.

title: PT Bank Btpn Syariah Tbk. Reports 23% Yoy Net Profit Growth In Q3 2025
body: The Bank Posted A Consolidated Net Profit Of Rp945 Billion In Q3 2025, Up 23% Year‑On‑Year, With Financing Disbursements Of Rp9.8 Trillion And Solid Ratios (Roa 7.5% And Car 57.4%). It Highlighted The Role Of Quality Financing, The Four Superior Customer Behaviors (Bdks), Intensive Community‑Officer Support, And Expanded Incentive Programs Such As The Umrah One‑Plane Reward, Which Saw Participation Rise To 18 Centers.

title: Tbs Energi Utama Reports Usd127.37 Million Loss For First Nine Months Of 2025
body: Tbs Energi Utama Posted A Net Loss Of Usd127.37 Million For The Nine Months Ended 2025, A 465.69% Decline From A Profit Of Usd34.83 Million A Year Earlier, Resulting In A Loss Per Share Of Usd0.0154 Versus A Profit Of Usd0.0043 Previously. Revenue Fell 14.39% To Usd288.17 Million, Gross Profit Dropped To Usd22.02 Million, Operating Loss Was Usd11.31 Million And A Loss On Subsidiary Divestment Of Usd96.86 Million, While Total Equity Decreased To Usd238.06 Million And Liabilities Rose To Usd567.62 Million.

title: PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk Reports 15.5% Revenue Growth And 16.2% Profit Increase In Q3 2025, Announces Second Treasury‑Share Release And Esg Awards
body: PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk Posted Q3 2025 Revenue Of Rp1.09 Trillion, Up 15.5% Year‑On‑Year, And Net Profit Of Rp140.67 Billion, Up 16.2%, With Ship‑Service Revenue Contributing 96.6% Of Total And Total Assets Rising 3.73% To Rp1.71 Trillion. The Company Completed A First‑Stage Treasury‑Share Release Of 3.39 Million Shares And Will Issue A Second Tranche Of 4.64 Million Shares In November 2025, While Also Receiving The Gold Champion Csr Award 2025 And Four 2024 Vision Awards For Its Sustainability Reporting.

title: PT Lippo Cikarang Tbk Reports A Q3 2025 Net Profit Of Rp264.84 Billion After A 249.2% Revenue Surge
body: The Property Subsidiary Of The Lippo Group Posted Net Revenue Of Rp3.36 Trillion And A Gross Profit Of Rp593.34 Billion In Q3 2025, Turning A Net Loss Of Rp1.6 Trillion A Year Earlier Into A Profit Of Rp264.84 Billion. Liabilities Fell 32.6% To Rp5.14 Trillion, Assets Stood At Rp11.84 Trillion, And The Shares Closed Up 1.67% At Rp610 Per Share.

title: PT Astra Otoparts Tbk Posts Modest Profit Growth And Asset Expansion In First Nine Months Of 2025
body: The Company Reported Net Revenue Of Idr 14.80 Trillion, Up 4.5% Yoy, With Gross Profit Rising 7.6% To Idr 2.40 Trillion And Net Profit Attributable To The Parent Increasing 2.6% To Idr 1.56 Trillion. Total Assets Grew 9.5% To Idr 23.02 Trillion While Liabilities Rose 19.3% To Idr 6.49 Trillion, And The Stock Slipped 1.44% To Idr 410.

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Buy Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 28, 2025 (WIB), Patrick Rudolf Dannacher bought shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,295, increasing holdings from 181,722,120 to 181,757,920. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Lim Shrimp Org Pte. Ltd Buy Shares of PT Sumber Mas Konstruksi Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 28, 2025 (WIB), Lim Shrimp Org Pte. Ltd buy shares of PT Sumber Mas Konstruksi Tbk (SMKM.JK) at approximately IDR 37. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT. Vina Nauli Jordania Sell Shares of PT Sumber Mas Konstruksi Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 28, 2025 (WIB), PT. Vina Nauli Jordania sell shares of PT Sumber Mas Konstruksi Tbk (SMKM.JK) at approximately IDR 37, decreasing holdings from 563,580,144 to 250,330,144. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Grup PT United Tractors Tbk’S Subsidiaries Win Two Asean Energy Awards 2025
body: PT Pamapersada Nusantara’s Pama Distrik Kpcs Earned 2Nd Runner‑Up In The Asean Best Practice Competition For Energy Management In Buildings And Industries, While PT Telen Orbit Prima Received The Best Small‑Scale Coal Mining Southeast Asia Award For Its Sustainable Mining Practices. The Awards, Presented By Indonesia’s Minister Of Energy And Mineral Resources Yuliot Tanjung, Underscore The Group’s Commitment To Esg And Sustainable Energy Transition.

title: PT Anugrah Neo Energy Materials Plans $300 Million Ipo To Fund Low‑Carbon Nickel Smelter And Expand Indonesia’S Ev Battery Supply Chain
body: PT Anugrah Neo Energy Materials (Anem) Is Targeting An Ipo Of More Than Usd 300 Million (≈Idr 4.98 Trillion) In December 2025, With A Valuation Expected To Exceed Usd 2 Billion (≈Idr 33.21 Trillion). Proceeds Will Finance The Company’s Expansion Of Its Two Sulawesi Nickel Mines And The Construction Of A Low‑Carbon Hpal Smelter At Neo Energy Industrial Park, Positioning Indonesia As A Key Player In The Global Ev Battery Supply Chain.

title: Indonesia’S North Maluku Targets Becoming World Spice Hub With Rp371 Trillion Investment
body: Indonesia’s Minister Of Agriculture, Andi Amran Sulaiman, Announced A Plan To Transform North Maluku Into The World’s Spice Hub, Backed By A Rp371 Trillion Financing Scheme To Boost Downstream Processing Of Key Commodities Such As Nutmeg, Cloves, And Coconuts. The Initiative Includes Expanding Coconut Plantations To 10,000–15,000 Hectares And Developing Processing Factories, Aiming To Lift The Current Rp24 Trillion Coconut Export Value By Up To A Hundredfold.

title: Indonesia To Finalise 2026 Minimum Wage Formula By November, Incorporating Decent Living Standards
body: Indonesia’s Manpower Minister Yassierli Said The 2026 Provincial Minimum Wage Formula Will Be Finalized In November, Following A Constitutional Court Ruling That It Must Consider Decent Living Standards, Inflation, And Economic Growth. Trade Union Leaders Have Proposed An 8.5–10.5% Increase, While The Government Is Reviewing The Proposal After A 6.5% Rise In 2025.

title: Indonesia'S Minister Targets Modernization Of 1,582 Fishing Vessels To Boost Maritime Competitiveness
body: Minister Marine Affairs And Fisheries Sakti Wahyu Trenggono Announced A Plan To Convert 1,582 Wooden Fishing Vessels Into Modern Steel Boats As Part Of President Prabowo’s Food Self‑Sufficiency Agenda, Aiming To Improve Fishermen’s Welfare, Increase Productivity, Create Jobs, And Raise Non‑Tax State Revenue. The Initiative Will Replace Older, Environmentally‑Concerned Wooden Boats—About 95% Of Indonesia’s Fleet—By Meeting Seaworthiness, Fishing, And On‑Board Storage Standards Through The Directorate General Of Capture Fisheries.

title: Indonesia To Build Laboratory Next Year To Certify Seafood As Free Of Radioactive Cesium For Us Exports
body: Minister Sakti Wahyu Trenggono Announced That A New Lab Will Be Established In 2026 To Test Indonesian Shrimp And Other Seafood For Cs‑137, With Exporters Required To Obtain A Radioactive‑Free Certificate Recognized By The Us Fda. The Certification Scheme Will Be Administered By The Ministry’s Regional Technical Units, Costs Will Be Borne By Exporters, And Related Fishery Product Transactions In Busan Total $2.56 Million.

title: PT Raja Roti Cemerlang Tbk Says No Corporate Action Has Been Executed As It Addresses Bei Inquiry Amid Sharp Stock Movements
body: The Company’s Shares Have Risen 77.65% In The Past Week, 106.85% In A Month And 169.64% Over Three Months, Though They Remain 24.29% Below The Ipo Price Of Rp210, And Fell 14.57% To A Daily Low Of Rp129 On The Day Of The Statement. Corporate Secretary Nurlijah Khairunisa Confirmed That No Acquisition Or Change Of Control Has Occurred, That A 2026 Corporate‑Action Plan Is Still Under Study With PT Bisnis Bersama Berkah As Lead Advisor, And That The Cause Of The Recent Price Surge Is Unknown.

title: PT Tbs Energi Utama Tbk Reports $288.2 Million Q3 2025 Revenue Driven By Rapid Growth In Waste‑Management And Green‑Energy Businesses
body: PT Tbs Energi Utama Tbk Posted Consolidated Revenue Of $288.2 Million In Q3 2025, With Waste‑Management Contributing About 39% After A >1,000% Yoy Increase, Cash Rising To $89 Million, Net Profit $1.8 Million And Adjusted Ebitda $31.8 Million, Supported By Divestments And Sustainable Financing. The Company’s Green Pillars—Cora Environment’s Waste‑To‑Energy Expansion, Electrum’s 6,400 Electric Motorcycles And 360 Battery‑Swap Stations Cutting Over 25 Tons Of Co₂ Daily, And Renewable Projects Like Pltmh Sumber Jaya And The Floating Solar Plts Tembesi (In Partnership With Pln Nusantara Power) Slated For Mid‑2026—Position It Toward Its 2030 Carbon‑Neutral Target.

title: PT Bank Negara Indonesia Tbk Atau Bni Disburses Over 109,000 Subsidized Home Loans Worth Rp17 Trillion
body: By September 2025, PT Bank Negara Indonesia Tbk Atau Bni Has Provided More Than 109,000 Subsidized Kpr Units Totaling Roughly Rp17 Trillion, Aligning With The Government’s Goal Of Building 3 Million Low‑Income Homes. The Bank’s Quota For Subsidized Mortgages Rose To 25,000 Units, With A Fixed 5% Interest Rate And Up To 20‑Year Tenor, Supported By Its Extensive Branch Network And Developer Partnerships.

title: Bursa Efek Indonesia Suspends Trading Of PT Agung Jenggangan Mas Tbk After Price Breach Of Upper Auto‑Rejection Limit
body: Bei Announced A Temporary Suspension Of PT Agung Jenggangan Mas Tbk's Shares Effective Thursday 30 October 2025, Following The Stock's Breach Of The Upper Auto‑Rejection Limit And Marking The Second Suspension Of Amms This Year. Prior To The Halt, The Shares Rose 9.33% To Rp492, Having Surged 44.71% In A Week, 127.78% In A Month, 417.89% In Three Months And About 1,100% Year‑To‑Date From The Start‑Of‑Year Level Of Rp41.

title: Indomobil Reports A 216% Increase In Net Profit To Rp257.59 Billion As Of September 30, 2025.
body: Indomobil, An Emiten Otomotif Salim Group, Has Seen Its Net Profit Surge By 216% To Rp257.59 Billion, With Its Earnings Per Share Rising To Rp64.49 From Rp20.40 In The Same Period Last Year. The Company's Net Revenue Reached Rp22.72 Trillion, A 4.65% Increase From The Same Period Last Year, With Its Total Assets Accumulating To Rp72.11 Trillion.

title: Energi Mega Persada Reports A 9% Increase In Net Profit To Usd55.65 Million In The First Nine Months Of 2025
body: Energi Mega Persada's Net Profit Rose 9% To Usd55.65 Million, Driven By A 13% Increase In Sales To Usd361.38 Million And A 24% Rise In Ebitda To Usd224.49 Million. The Company's Focus On Efficiency And Profitability Is Reflected In Its Improved Financial Performance, With A 39% Increase In Gross Profit And A 6% Rise In Average Oil Production To 8,381 Barrels Per Day.

title: Astra Graphia'S Net Profit Increases By 20% To Rp181 Billion As Of September 30, 2025, Driven By Positive Performance Of Its Technology Information Solutions Unit.
body: Astra Graphia's Net Profit Has Jumped 20% To Rp181 Billion As Of September 30, 2025, Supported By An 11% Increase In Net Revenue, With The Company Also Participating In The Allprint Indonesia Expo 2025 To Showcase Its Latest Printing Technology Solutions. The Company's Commitment To Supporting The Growth Of The Creative Industry Is Further Demonstrated By Its Receipt Of The Investortrust Csr Awards 2025 For Its Vocational Education Initiatives.

title: Semen Baturaja Reports A Net Profit Of Rp146.3 Billion In The First Quarter Of 2025, A 310.83% Increase From The Same Period Last Year.
body: Semen Baturaja Achieved A Significant Increase In Net Profit, Rising By 310.83% To Rp146.3 Billion In The First Quarter Of 2025, Driven By A 27% Growth In Revenue To Rp1.78 Trillion. The Company's Earnings Per Share Increased To Rp15 From Rp4 In The Same Period Last Year, With Total Assets Valued At Rp4.8 Trillion And Total Liabilities Of Rp1.41 Trillion.

title: Supra Boga Reports 30 September 2025 Financial Results With Net Income Of Idr 45.8 Billion
body: Supra Boga's Net Income For The Period Ended 30 September 2025 Reached Idr 45.8 Billion, A 187.88% Increase From The Same Period Last Year. The Company's Total Assets Decreased To Idr 1.08 Trillion, While Its Total Liabilities Decreased To Idr 807.65 Billion.

title: Bukit Uluwatu'S Net Profit Surges 661.96% To Rp108.58 Billion In The First Nine Months Of 2025
body: Bukit Uluwatu, Under The Guidance Of Happy Hapsoro, Reported A Significant Increase In Net Profit To Rp108.58 Billion, Up 661.96% From The Same Period Last Year, With Earnings Per Share Rising To Rp5.27 From Rp0.69. The Company's Revenue Reached Rp288.7 Billion, A 6.07% Increase From The Previous Year, With Total Assets Valued At Rp2.04 Trillion And Total Equity At Rp1.45 Trillion.

title: PT Cakra Buana Resources Energi Tbk. Completes Extraordinary General Meeting, Approving Strategic Acquisitions And Capital Raising Plans
body: PT Cakra Buana Resources Energi Tbk. Completed Its Extraordinary General Meeting, Approving The Acquisition Of Hai Long 106 And Plans For A Right Issue To Strengthen Its Capital Structure. The Acquisition Is Expected To Increase The Company's Assets And Revenue Through Large Offshore Contracts, But Also Raises Concerns About Debt Equity Ratio And Potential Mandatory Tender Offers.

title: PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk Records Solid Performance In Q3 2025 With A Net Profit Of Rp1.54 Trillion
body: PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk Achieved A Net Profit Of Rp1.54 Trillion In Q3 2025, Driven By Improved Operational Efficiency And Optimization Of Its Tower And Fiber Optic Business Portfolio, With Revenue Growing 0.9% Year-Over-Year To Rp6.88 Trillion. The Company's Ebitda Increased 1.8% Year-Over-Year To Rp5.77 Trillion, With A Margin Of 83.8%, Supported By A 3.4% Year-Over-Year Reduction In Operational Costs To Rp1.11 Trillion.

title: PT Go-To Gojek Tokopedia Tbk Reports Significant Improvement In Net Loss And Revenue Growth
body: PT Go-To Gojek Tokopedia Tbk Saw Its Net Loss Decrease By 82.0% To Idr 996.98 Billion In The Nine-Month Period Ending September 2025, Driven By A 14.0% Increase In Revenue To Idr 13.30 Trillion. The Company's Improved Performance Was Also Reflected In Its Positive Ebitda For Four Consecutive Quarters.

title: PT Tower And Infrastructure Tbk Plan To Repurchase Up To Idr 360 Billion Worth Of Shares
body: PT Tower And Infrastructure Tbk (Tbi) Plans To Repurchase Up To Idr 360 Billion Worth Of Shares, Or Approximately 158 Million Shares, To Be Held As Treasury Shares. This Move Aims To Stabilize The Company's Stock Price And Is Expected To Increase Earnings Per Share To Idr 37.00.

title: PT Kreasi Jasa Persada Buy Shares of Petrosea Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 29, 2025 (WIB), PT Kreasi Jasa Persada bought shares of Petrosea Tbk (PTRO.JK) at approximately IDR 6,539, increasing holdings from 4,570,282,400 to 4,571,811,700. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Sentra Investa Maksima Sell Shares of PT Lavender Bina Cendikia Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 29, 2025 (WIB), PT Sentra Investa Maksima sold shares of PT Lavender Bina Cendikia Tbk (BMBL.JK) at approximately IDR 45, decreasing holdings from 111,495,100 to 111,195,100. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Febyan Buy Shares of PT Indonesia Pondasi Raya Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 30, 2025 (WIB), Febyan bought shares of PT Indonesia Pondasi Raya Tbk (IDPR.JK) at approximately IDR 378, increasing holdings from 53,263,500 to 54,110,800. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Cakra Bhakti Para Putra Buy Shares of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 30, 2025 (WIB), PT Cakra Bhakti Para Putra bought shares of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk (ISSP.JK) at approximately IDR 414, increasing holdings from 4,118,806,030 to 4,125,068,230. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Phillip Tjipto Buy Shares of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 29, 2025 (WIB), Phillip Tjipto bought shares of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk (IMPC.JK) at approximately IDR 2,288, increasing holdings from 157,500,000 to 158,750,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Haryanto Tjiptodihardjo Buy Shares of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 29, 2025 (WIB), Haryanto Tjiptodihardjo bought shares of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk (IMPC.JK) at approximately IDR 2,273, increasing holdings from 621,258,000 to 624,258,000. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Buy Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: According to the published announcement on October 29, 2025 (WIB), Patrick Rudolf Dannacher bought shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at approximately IDR 1,300, increasing holdings from 181,757,920 to 183,248,220. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Bambang Subagio Wiyono Buy Shares of PT Paragon Karya Perkasa Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 30, 2025 (WIB), Bambang Subagio Wiyono bought shares of PT Paragon Karya Perkasa Tbk (PKPK.JK) at approximately IDR 545, increasing holdings from 2,419,800 to 2,499,300. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: PT Cakra Bhakti Para Putra Buy Shares of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 30, 2025 (WIB), PT Cakra Bhakti Para Putra bought shares of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk (ISSP.JK) at approximately IDR 414, increasing holdings from 4,118,806,030 to 4,125,068,230. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Erlangga Ksatria Buy Shares of PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk
body: According to the published announcement on October 30, 2025 (WIB), Erlangga Ksatria bought shares of PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk (LFLO.JK) at approximately IDR 120, increasing holdings from 301,496,700 to 319,463,460. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Indonesia Seeks 0% Us Tariff On Palm Oil, Mirroring Malaysia'S Success
body: Indonesia Is Pushing Negotiations With The United States To Reduce Palm Oil Tariffs To 0%, Following Malaysia's Recent Agreement That Lowered Its Tariffs From 25% To 19% And Then To 0%. The Indonesian Government, Led By Acting Director General Agro-Industry Putu Juli Ardika And Coordinating Minister Airlangga Hartarto, Is Targeting Exemptions For Key Commodities Such As Palm Oil, Rubber, And Cocoa, After Previously Reducing Import Tariffs From 32% To 19%.

title: Indonesia Targets 2026 Start Of Dme Coal Downstreaming Project To Cut Lpg Imports
body: Minister Bahlil Lahadalia Announced That Construction Of A Dimethyl Ether (Dme) Coal‑Downstreaming Project Will Begin In 2026, Aiming To Replace 6.5–7 Million Tons Of Lpg Imports With Domestic Production. PT Bukit Asam Tbk Has Earmarked 800 Million Tons Of Coal, Allocating 5–6 Million Tons Per Year For The Dme Project, While The Downstreaming Task Force Finalizes Pre‑Feasibility Studies And Partners With Danantara For Technology Selection.

title: Indonesia'S Ministry Of Energy And Mineral Resources Reopens Five Mining Companies After Suspension Of 190 Firms
body: The Ministry Of Energy And Mineral Resources Has Allowed Five Of The 190 Coal And Mineral Mining Companies That Were Temporarily Suspended To Resume Operations, While About 100 Companies Have Submitted Requests To Do So. The Decision Follows Prior Warning Letters And Emphasizes The Requirement For Companies To Pay Reclamation Guarantees To Ensure Post‑Mining Land Restoration.

title: Indonesia Targets Full Electrification By 2030, Minister Announces 2026 Completion For North Sulawesi
body: Minister Energy Mineral Resources Bahlil Lahadalia Unveiled A Rural Electrification Program In Minahasa, North Sulawesi, Pledging Full Electrification Of All Villages By 2030 And Completion Of Remaining North Sulawesi Villages By 2026. The National Electrification Ratio Reached 99.83% In The First Half Of 2025, While West Papua And East Nusa Tenggara Lag At 89.80% And 89.22% Respectively.

title: Indonesia'S Forestry And Finance Ministries Sign Mou To Optimize Forest Revenue And Conservation Funding
body: Forestry Minister Raja Juli Antoni And Finance Minister Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa Signed A Memorandum Of Understanding To Strengthen Cooperation On Managing Non‑Tax State Revenue From Forests, Including Digital Data Exchange And Reinvestment Of Funds Into Conservation, Ecosystem Restoration, And Law Enforcement. The Ministries Highlighted The Sector's Economic Potential, Estimating That Proper Management Could Generate "Hundreds Of Trillions" Of Rupiah In Additional State Revenue.

title: Indonesia'S Ministry Of Industry Targets East Java For New Ethanol Plant To Support Mandatory 10% Bioethanol Blend
body: The Ministry Is Evaluating East Java, Where A Rp1.6 Trillion Ratoon Removal Program Will Rejuvenate 70,000 Hectares Of Sugarcane, As The Most Promising Site For A Bioethanol Plant That Can Help Meet The President‑Approved 10% Ethanol Fuel Blend Requiring 1.4 Million Kiloliters Of Ethanol By 2027. Additional Locations Such As Merauke And Potential Sago‑Based Projects In Other Islands Are Also Under Study, With Interest From Toyota In Establishing An Ethanol Facility.

title: Indonesia Expands Community-Driven Energy Programs To Boost Rural Electrification And Renewable Capacity
body: Indonesia's Ministry Of Energy And Mineral Resources Announced Expanded Community-Focused Initiatives, Including Rural Electrification, The Management Of About 45,000 Community Oil Wells And A Plan To Build 1.5‑Mw Solar Power Plants In 70,000 Villages, Potentially Delivering Up To 100 Gw Of Renewable Capacity. State‑Owned PT Pln Is Tasked With Connecting The Remaining 5,700 Villages And 4,400 Hamlets To The Grid, And The Government Met Its 2025 Oil Lifting Target Of 605,000 Barrels Per Day Through Flexible Production‑Sharing Contracts.

title: Allo Bank Allocates Rp119.37 Billion For Ongoing Share Buyback Program
body: Allo Bank, Chaired By Chairul Tanjung, Will Use The Remaining Rp119.37 Billion Of Its Rp168.81 Billion Buyback Budget To Repurchase Shares From 30 October 2025 To 29 January 2025, Aiming To Stabilize The Stock Price And Maintain Flexibility. The Company Expects The Buyback, With Treasury‑Share Treatment Under Pojk 29/2023, To Have No Material Adverse Effect On Liquidity Or Growth.

title: Archi Indonesia Reports Nine‑Month 2025 Net Profit Of $70.47 Million, A 1,912% Year‑On‑Year Increase
body: Archi Indonesia Posted A Net Profit Of Usd 70.47 Million For The First Nine Months Of 2025, Up 1,911.56% From The Same Period A Year Earlier, With Basic Eps Rising To Usd 0.0028 From A Loss Of Usd 0.0002. Revenue Grew 52.67% To Usd 328.7 Million, Gross Profit To Usd 142.8 Million, And Total Assets Reached Usd 953.18 Million, With Equity Of Usd 343.95 Million And Liabilities Of Usd 609.22 Million.

title: Bank Syariah Indonesia Alias Bsi Reports 9% Increase In Net Profit To Rp5.56 Trillion For Fy Ending 30 September 2025
body: The Bank Recorded Net Profit Of Rp5.56 Trillion, Up 9% From Rp5.1 Trillion A Year Earlier, And Earnings Per Share Rose To Rp120.72. Total Assets Grew To Rp416.56 Trillion, Equity To Rp49.84 Trillion, While Liabilities Fell To Rp88.22 Trillion.

title: Mnc Energy Reports 48% Drop In Net Profit For Jan‑Sept 2025 Amid Revenue Decline
body: For The January‑September 2025 Period, Mnc Energy Posted Net Profit Of Roughly Usd7 Million, Down 47.8% Year‑On‑Year, With Earnings Per Share Falling To Usd0.00023. Revenue Fell To Usd62.39 Million, While Equity Rose To Usd135.61 Million And Liabilities Decreased To Usd102.57 Million.

title: PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk Announces Dividend Interim For 2025
body: PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk Has Approved A Dividend Interim Of Usd 42 Million For 2025, Representing A 66% Increase From The Previous Year. The Total Dividend Payout For 2025 Is Expected To Reach Usd 80 Million, A 18% Increase Per Share Compared To 2024.

title: Indonesia To Implement 50% Biodiesel Program In 2026 Amid Cpo Supply Assurance
body: Indonesia’s Energy Mineral Resources Minister Bahlil Lahadalia Confirmed That The Upcoming 50% Biodiesel (B50) Program, Which Will Increase Cpo Requirements By 5.3 Million Tonnes Annually, Will Not Compromise Domestic Cooking Oil Supply, With Plans To Curb Palm Oil Exports And Enforce A Domestic Market Obligation. The Program Is Backed By Indonesia’s 46 Million‑Ton Cpo Production, Of Which 20 Million Tonnes Are Processed Domestically And 26 Million Tonnes Are Exported.

title: Indonesia Makes Ispo Sustainable Palm Oil Certification Mandatory For All Producers, Expanding To Full Supply Chain
body: Indonesia Has Mandated The Indonesian Sustainable Palm Oil (Ispo) Certification For All Palm Oil Companies And Smallholders, Extending Its Scope To Cover The Entire Upstream‑To‑Downstream Supply Chain And Encouraging Digital Traceability. As Of 2025, 6.52 Million Hectares Of The 16.38 Million Hectares Of Oil Palm Plantations Have Been Certified, Underscoring The Country’s Commitment To Sustainability And Market Confidence.

title: Indonesia’S Defense Minister Announces Goal To Achieve Soybean Self‑Sufficiency And Export Status Within 2‑3 Years
body: Defense Minister Sjafrie Sjamsoeddin Said The Government Will Eliminate Soybean Imports, Citing A Recent 30‑Hectare Navy‑Owned Harvest Of About 60 Tons As Proof Of The Program’s Progress. The Plan Involves The Armed Forces, With The Navy Leading Soybean Production, The Army Focusing On Rice, And The Air Force Supporting Land Cultivation, Aiming To Turn Indonesia Into A Soybean Exporter In The Next Two To Three Years.

title: Indonesia'S Agriculture Minister And Presidential Chief Staff Verify 20% Fertilizer Price Cut In Lampung
body: Agriculture Minister Andi Amran Sulaiman And Presidential Chief Staff Muhammad Qodari Inspected The Mitra Tani Sejati Fertilizer Kiosk In North Kotabumi, Lampung, Confirming That The Government’s 20% Reduction In Subsidized Fertilizer Prices Is Being Implemented. Under Minister Of Agriculture Regulation No. 1117/Kpts/Sr.310/M/10/2025, Prices Were Lowered—For Example, Urea From Rp2,250 To Rp1,800 Per Kilogram And Npk From Rp2,300 To Rp1,840 Per Kilogram.

title: Indonesia'S Ihsg Rises 0.91% To 8,166 Amid Volatility And Upcoming Msci Free‑Float Changes, Analyst Targets Year‑End Level 8,120
body: The Jakarta Composite Index (Ihsg) Closed Up 0.91% At 8,166 On Wednesday After Three Days Of Declines, Reflecting A 1.52% Monthly Gain And A 15.34% Rise Year‑To‑Date. Analyst Harry Su Warned The Short‑Term Correction Could Continue, Highlighted Msci’s Pending Free‑Float Methodology Revision That May Reduce Indonesia’s Index Weight, Set A Year‑End Target Of 8,120, And Recommended Buying Bbca, Tlkm, Icbp And Amrt With Specific Price Targets.
